1963   subroutine obs_class_initialize(obsColumnMode_in, myip)
1964      !
1965      !:Purpose: Set observation-data class variables.
1966      !      Set variables that take the same value for all instances of the
1967      !      class.
1968      !
1969      implicit none
1970      ! mode controlling the subset of columns that are activated in all objects
1971      character(len=*), intent(in), optional :: obsColumnMode_in
1972      integer, intent(in), optional :: myip
1973
1974      integer :: myip_
1975
1976      ! The 'save' makes this a CLASS-CONSTANT variable
1977      character(len=12), save :: obsColumnMode_class = '            '
1978
1979      INITIALIZED: if(.not. obs_class_initialized) then
1980         obs_class_initialized = .true.
1981
1982         if(present(myip)) then
1983            myip_ = myip
1984         else
1985            ! Make an assumption:  cause every processor to write much to stdout
1986            myip_ = 0
1987         end if
1988
1989         ! Determine which columns will be initially active
1990         if(present(obsColumnMode_in)) then
1991            obsColumnMode_class=trim(obsColumnMode_in)
1992         else
1993            obsColumnMode_class='ALL '
1994         endif
1995
1996         write(*,*)'OBS_CLASS_INITIALIZE: obsColumnMode=', &
1997                   trim(obsColumnMode_class)
1998
1999         ! DELEGATE THE REAL WORK TO THE ODC CLASS
2000         ! DELEGATE THE REAL WORK TO THE ODC CLASS
2001         call odc_class_initialize(obsColumnMode_class)
2002
2003      else INITIALIZED
2004         write(*,*) 'obs_class_initialize: !!! WARNING WARNING WARNING!!!'
2005         write(*,*) 'obs_class_initialize: already called before, not ' &
2006                    // 're-activating columns'
2007         write(*,*) 'obs_class_initialize: !!! WARNING WARNING WARNING!!!'
2008         if(present(obsColumnMode_in)) then
2009            if(trim(obsColumnMode_in) /= trim(obsColumnMode_class)) then
2010               call obs_abort('obs_class_initialize: called with different '&
2011                            //'value of obsColumnMode than during first call: '&
2012                            // trim(obsColumnMode_class) // ' /= ' &
2013                            // trim(obsColumnMode_in))
2014               return
2015            endif
2016         endif
2017      endif INITIALIZED
2018   end subroutine obs_class_initialize
2019
2020
2021   subroutine obs_clean(obsdat,hx,nens,nobsout,qcvar,checkZha_opt)
2022      !
2023      !:Purpose: remove all observations from the obsdat  
2024      !           that will not be assimilated. 
2025      !
2026      !:Arguments:
2027      !           :nobsout: unit number for the ASCII output
2028      !           :qcvar:   input logical indicating if the input obsdat 
2029      !                     data have benefited from a qc-var procedure
2030      !:The logic applied:
2031      !     A body (and its associated header)
2032      !     will be retained if these three conditions are all met:
2033      !
2034      !         - 1) either of:
2035      !
2036      !             - 1a) btest(obsdat%intBodies%columns(OBS_FLG,jdata),12)
2037      !             - 1b) .not. qcvar (the 5th parameter of obs_clean)
2038      !         - 2) obsdat% intBodies%columns(OBS_ASS,jdata) == 1
2039      !         - 3) obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_ZHA,jdata) >= 0.0
2040      !
2041      implicit none
2042
2043      type (struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
2044
2045      real(8), intent(inout) :: hx(:,:)
2046      integer, intent(in)    :: nens
2047      integer, intent(in)    :: nobsout
2048      logical, intent(in)    :: qcvar
2049      logical, intent(in), optional :: checkZha_opt
2050
2051      integer :: iaccept,idata,ipnt,iwrite
2052      integer :: jdata,kobs,var3d,kobsout
2053      integer :: column_index
2054      integer :: active_index
2055      logical :: checkZha
2056
2057      if (nobsout > 0) write(nobsout,'(1x,A,I7)') 'stations prior to cleanup: ', obsdat%numHeader
2058      write(*,*) 'enter obs_clean'
2059
2060      ! User can choose if check on negativity of OBS_ZHA is done (is done by default)
2061      if (present(checkZha_opt)) then
2062        checkZha = checkZha_opt
2063      else
2064        checkZha = .true.
2065      end if
2066
2067      kobsout=0 
2068      iwrite=0
2069      stations: do kobs=1,obsdat%numHeader
2070         ipnt  = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, kobs)
2071         idata = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, kobs)
2072         iaccept=0
2073         observations: do jdata = ipnt, ipnt + idata - 1
2074            if (     btest(obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_FLG, jdata),12) &
2075                .or. .not. qcvar) then 
2076               ! data will be accepted if they went through the variational
2077               ! system  including the qcvar. They will also be accepted if the
2078               ! qcvar procedure was not applied (i.e. when backalt files are
2079               ! used as input).
2080               var3d=1
2081            else
2082               var3d=0
2083            endif
2084
2085            ! To remove observations for which the height in the atmosphere has
2086            ! not been assigned (for instance because they are above the model
2087            ! top for the EnKF system)
2088            if (checkZha .and. obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, OBS_ZHA, jdata) < 0.) then
2089               call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat, OBS_ASS, jdata, -1)
2090            endif
2091
2092            if (      (obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, OBS_ASS, jdata) == obs_assimilated) &
2093                 .and.(var3d == 1)) then 
2094               ! the observation will be used in the analysis
2095               iaccept=iaccept+1
2096               iwrite=iwrite+1
2097               do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
2098                  column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2099                                       obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
2100                     call obs_bodySet_i (obsdat, column_index, iwrite, &
2101                          obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, column_index, jdata))
2102               enddo
2103               do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
2104                  column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2105                                      obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
2106                     call obs_bodySet_r (obsdat, column_index, iwrite, &
2107                          obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, column_index, jdata))
2108               enddo
2109               hx(1:nens,iwrite)=hx(1:nens,jdata)
2110               ! Revise the header row cross-index to match the revised headers
2111               call obs_bodySet_i (obsdat, OBS_HIND, iwrite, kobsout+1)
2112            endif
2113         enddo observations
2114
2115         ! adjust obsdat%realHeaders%columns 
2116         if (iaccept > 0) then
2117            kobsout=kobsout+1
2118            do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
2119               column_index = odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2120                                      obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,active_index)
2121               call obs_headSet_i (obsdat, column_index, kobsout, &
2122                    obs_headElem_i(obsdat, column_index, kobs))
2123            enddo
2124            do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
2125               column_index = odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2126                                     obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour,active_index)
2127               call obs_headSet_r (obsdat, column_index, kobsout, &
2128                    obs_headElem_r(obsdat, column_index, kobs))
2129            enddo
2130            obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(kobsout) = obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(kobs)
2131            obsdat%cstnid(kobsout)=obsdat%cstnid(kobs)
2132            obsdat%cfamily(kobsout)=obsdat%cfamily(kobs)
2133            ! Revise the body cross-indices to match the revised bodies
2134            call obs_headSet_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, kobsout, iaccept)
2135            call obs_headSet_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, kobsout, iwrite-iaccept+1)
2136         endif
2137      enddo stations
2138      obsdat%numHeader=kobsout
2139      obsdat%numBody = iwrite
2140
2141      if (nobsout > 0) then
2142        write(nobsout,'(1x,A)') 'after cleanup of the cma: '
2143        write(nobsout,'(1x,A,I7)') &
2144             'number of stations containing valid data   ',obsdat%numHeader
2145        write(nobsout,'(1x,A,I7)') & 
2146             'number of observations now in the cma file ',obsdat%numBody
2147      end if
2148
2149   end subroutine obs_clean
2150
2151
2152   subroutine obs_clean2(obsdat)
2153     !
2154     !:Purpose: remove all observations from the obsdat  
2155     !           that will not be assimilated. 
2156     !           modified version of obs_clean, used by MIDAS
2157     !
2158     implicit none
2159
2160     type (struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
2161
2162     integer :: numBodyAccept,bodyIndexEnd,bodyIndexBeg,numBodyCleaned
2163     integer :: bodyIndex,headerIndex,numHeaderCleaned
2164     integer :: column_index
2165     integer :: active_index
2166
2167     write(*,*) 'before cleanup of obsSpaceData:'
2168     write(*,*) 'number of headers ', obsdat%numHeader
2169     write(*,*) 'number of bodies  ', obsdat%numBody
2170
2171     numHeaderCleaned = 0 
2172     numBodyCleaned = 0
2173     stations: do headerIndex = 1, obsdat%numHeader
2174       bodyIndexBeg = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, headerIndex)
2175       bodyIndexEnd = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, headerIndex) + bodyIndexBeg - 1
2176       numBodyAccept = 0
2177       observations: do bodyIndex = bodyIndexBeg, bodyIndexEnd
2178         if ( obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_ASS,bodyIndex) == obs_assimilated ) then
2179           ! the observation will be used in the analysis
2180           numBodyAccept = numBodyAccept + 1
2181           numBodyCleaned = numBodyCleaned + 1
2182           do active_index = 1, odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
2183             column_index = odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2184                              obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
2185             call obs_bodySet_i (obsdat, column_index, numBodyCleaned, &
2186                  obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, column_index, bodyIndex))
2187           enddo
2188           do active_index = 1, odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
2189             column_index = odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2190                                 obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
2191             call obs_bodySet_r (obsdat, column_index, numBodyCleaned, &
2192                                 obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, column_index, bodyIndex))
2193           enddo
2194           ! Revise the header row cross-index to match the revised headers
2195           call obs_bodySet_i (obsdat, OBS_HIND, numBodyCleaned, numHeaderCleaned+1)
2196         endif
2197       enddo observations
2198
2199       ! adjust obsdat%realHeaders%columns 
2200       if (numBodyAccept > 0) then
2201         numHeaderCleaned = numHeaderCleaned + 1
2202         do active_index = 1, odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
2203           column_index = odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2204                                  obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,active_index)
2205           call obs_headSet_i (obsdat, column_index, numHeaderCleaned, &
2206                obs_headElem_i(obsdat, column_index, headerIndex))
2207         enddo
2208         do active_index = 1, odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
2209           column_index = odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
2210                                 obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour,active_index)
2211           call obs_headSet_r (obsdat, column_index, numHeaderCleaned, &
2212                obs_headElem_r(obsdat, column_index, headerIndex))
2213         enddo
2214         obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(numHeaderCleaned) = obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex)
2215         obsdat%cstnid(numHeaderCleaned) = obsdat%cstnid(headerIndex)
2216         obsdat%cfamily(numHeaderCleaned) = obsdat%cfamily(headerIndex)
2217         ! Revise the body cross-indices to match the revised bodies
2218         call obs_headSet_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, numHeaderCleaned, numBodyAccept)
2219         call obs_headSet_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, numHeaderCleaned, numBodyCleaned-numBodyAccept+1)
2220       endif
2221     enddo stations
2222     obsdat%numHeader = numHeaderCleaned
2223     obsdat%numBody = numBodyCleaned
2224
2225     ! reallocate obsdat to free up memory
2226     call obs_squeeze(obsdat)
2227
2228     write(*,*) 'after cleanup of obsSpaceData: '
2229     write(*,*) 'number of headers with valid data   ',obsdat%numHeader
2230     write(*,*) 'number of bodies kept               ',obsdat%numBody
2231
2232   end subroutine obs_clean2
2233

2294   function obs_columnIndexFromName(column_name) result(column_index_out)
2295      !
2296      !:Purpose:
2297      !      Situations do occur where the client knows only the name of a
2298      !      column, but needs to know its index. This method supplies the index.
2299      !
2300      implicit none
2301      character(len=*)        , intent(in) :: column_name
2302      integer                              :: column_index_out
2303
2304      integer            :: column_index
2305      logical            :: lfound
2306      character(len=100) :: message
2307
2308      lfound=.false.
2309
2310      ! check integer-header
2311      do column_index=odc_flavour_IH%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_IH%ncol_end
2312         if(trim(column_name) == &
2313            trim(odc_flavour_IH%columnNameList(column_index)))then
2314            lfound=.true.
2315            column_index_out = column_index
2316            exit
2317         endif
2318      enddo
2319      if (lfound) return
2320
2321      ! check real-header
2322      do column_index=odc_flavour_RH%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_RH%ncol_end
2323         if(trim(column_name) == &
2324            trim(odc_flavour_RH%columnNameList(column_index)))then
2325            lfound=.true.
2326            column_index_out = column_index
2327            exit
2328         endif
2329      enddo
2330      if (lfound) return
2331
2332      ! check integer-body
2333      do column_index=odc_flavour_IB%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_IB%ncol_end
2334         if(trim(column_name) == &
2335            trim(odc_flavour_IB%columnNameList(column_index)))then
2336            lfound=.true.
2337            column_index_out = column_index
2338            exit
2339         endif
2340      enddo
2341      if (lfound) return
2342
2343      ! check real-body
2344      do column_index=odc_flavour_RB%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_RB%ncol_end
2345         if(trim(column_name) == &
2346            trim(odc_flavour_RB%columnNameList(column_index)))then
2347            lfound=.true.
2348            column_index_out = column_index
2349            exit
2350         endif
2351      enddo
2352      if (lfound) return
2353
2354      write(message,*)'abort in obs_columnIndexFromName: ' // &
2355                      'name not found='// trim(column_name)
2356      call obs_abort(message); return
2357
2358   end function obs_columnIndexFromName
2359
2360  function obs_isColumnNameValid(column_name) result(isValid)  
2361    !
2362    !:Purpose: Check if the obsSpaceData column name is valid.
2363    !      
2364    implicit none
2365
2366    ! arguements:
2367    character(len=*), intent(in)  :: column_name
2368    logical                       :: isValid
2369
2370    ! locals: 
2371    integer                       :: column_index
2372
2373    call odc_initAllColumnFlavours()
2374
2375    isValid = .false.
2376
2377    ! check "STID" 
2378    if (trim(column_name) == "STID") isValid = .true.
2379 
2380    if (isValid) return
2381
2382    ! check integer-header
2383    do column_index = odc_flavour_IH%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_IH%ncol_end
2384      if (trim(column_name) == &
2385           trim(odc_flavour_IH%columnNameList(column_index))) then
2386        isValid = .true.
2387        exit
2388      end if
2389    end do
2390    if (isValid) return
2391
2392    ! check real-header
2393    do column_index = odc_flavour_RH%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_RH%ncol_end
2394      if (trim(column_name) == &
2395           trim(odc_flavour_RH%columnNameList(column_index))) then
2396        isValid = .true.
2397        exit
2398      end if
2399    end do
2400    if (isValid) return
2401  
2402    ! check integer-body
2403    do column_index = odc_flavour_IB%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_IB%ncol_end
2404      if (trim(column_name) == &
2405           trim(odc_flavour_IB%columnNameList(column_index))) then
2406        isValid = .true.
2407        exit
2408      end if
2409    end do
2410    if (isValid) return
2411
2412    ! check real-body
2413    do column_index = odc_flavour_RB%ncol_beg, odc_flavour_RB%ncol_end
2414      if (trim(column_name) == &
2415           trim(odc_flavour_RB%columnNameList(column_index))) then
2416        isValid = .true.
2417        exit
2418      end if
2419    end do
2420    if (isValid) return
2421   
2422  end function obs_isColumnNameValid

2425   function obs_columnIndexFromNameForFlavour(odc_flavour, column_name) &
2426                                                         result(column_index_out)
2427      !
2428      !:Purpose:
2429      !      Situations do occur where the client knows only the name of a
2430      !      column, but needs to know its index. This method supplies the index.
2431      !
2432      implicit none
2433      type(struct_odc_flavour), intent(in) :: odc_flavour
2434      character(len=*)        , intent(in) :: column_name
2435      integer                              :: column_index_out
2436
2437      integer            :: column_index
2438      logical            :: lfound
2439      character(len=100) :: message
2440
2441      lfound=.false.
2442      do column_index=odc_flavour%ncol_beg, odc_flavour%ncol_end
2443         if(trim(column_name) == &
2444            trim(odc_flavour%columnNameList(column_index)))then
2445            lfound=.true.
2446            column_index_out = column_index
2447            exit
2448         endif
2449      enddo
2450
2451      if(.not.lfound) then
2452         write(message,*)'abort in obs_columnIndexFromNameForFlavour [' &
2453                       // odc_flavour%dataType //','// odc_flavour%headOrBody //&
2454                       ']: name not found='// column_name
2455         call obs_abort(message); return
2456      end if
2457   end function obs_columnIndexFromNameForFlavour

2516   function obs_columnDataType(columnIndex) result(dataType)
2517     !
2518     !:Purpose: return the data type of column, either 'real' or 'integer'
2519     !
2520     implicit none
2521
2522     integer, intent(in) :: columnIndex
2523     character(len=7)    :: dataType
2524
2525     if (columnIndex >= NHDR_INT_BEG .and. columnIndex <= NHDR_INT_END) then
2526       dataType = 'integer'
2527     else if (columnIndex >= NHDR_REAL_BEG .and. columnIndex <= NHDR_REAL_END) then
2528       dataType = 'real'
2529     else if (columnIndex >= NBDY_INT_BEG .and. columnIndex <= NBDY_INT_END) then
2530       dataType = 'integer'
2531     else if (columnIndex >= NBDY_REAL_BEG .and. columnIndex <= NBDY_REAL_END) then
2532       dataType = 'real'
2533     else
2534       call obs_abort('obs_columnDataType: invalid value of column index')
2535     end if
2536
2537   end function obs_columnDataType

2540   subroutine obs_copy( obs_a, obs_b )
2541      !
2542      !:Purpose: copy an obsdat object
2543      !
2544      !:Arguments:
2545      !           :obs_a: input object
2546      !           :obs_b: a copy of obs_a
2547      !
2548      !:Note: this method assumes that obs_b has already been initialized
2549      !
2550      implicit none
2551
2552      type(struct_obs), intent(in)    :: obs_a
2553      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obs_b
2554
2555      integer :: column_index
2556
2557      ! check if object to be copied is empty and react appropriately
2558      if (obs_a%numHeader_max == 0 .or. obs_a%numBody_max == 0) then
2559         obs_b%numHeader     = obs_a%numHeader
2560         obs_b%numHeader_max = obs_a%numHeader_max
2561         obs_b%numBody       = obs_a%numBody
2562         obs_b%numBody_max   = obs_a%numBody_max
2563         return
2564      endif
2565
2566      !** Commented out by M. Buehner to allow use in EnVar (also added copy of 
2567      !** headerIndex_mpiglobal and bodyIndex_mpiglobal, if they exist)
2568      !if(obs_a%mpi_local)then
2569      !   call obs_abort( &
2570      !         'obs_copy() is not equipped to handle the case, mpi_local=.true.')
2571      !   return
2572      !end if
2573
2574      do column_index=NHDR_REAL_BEG,NHDR_REAL_END
2575         if(obs_a%realHeaders%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index))  &
2576              obs_b%realHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_r(:) &
2577            = obs_a%realHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_r(:)
2578      enddo
2579      do column_index=NHDR_INT_BEG,NHDR_INT_END
2580         if(obs_a%intHeaders%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index))  &
2581              obs_b%intHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_i(:) &
2582            = obs_a%intHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_i(:)
2583      enddo
2584      do column_index=NBDY_REAL_BEG,NBDY_REAL_END
2585         if(obs_a%realBodies%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index))  &
2586              obs_b%realBodies%columns(column_index)%value_r(:) &
2587            = obs_a%realBodies%columns(column_index)%value_r(:)
2588      enddo
2589      do column_index=NBDY_INT_BEG,NBDY_INT_END
2590         if(obs_a%intBodies%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index))  &
2591              obs_b%intBodies%columns(column_index)%value_i(:) &
2592            = obs_a%intBodies%columns(column_index)%value_i(:)
2593      enddo
2594      obs_b%headerPrimaryKey(:) = obs_a%headerPrimaryKey(:)
2595      obs_b%cstnid(:)     = obs_a%cstnid(:)
2596      obs_b%cfamily(:)    = obs_a%cfamily(:)
2597
2598      obs_b%numHeader     = obs_a%numHeader
2599      obs_b%numHeader_max = obs_a%numHeader_max
2600      obs_b%numBody       = obs_a%numBody
2601      obs_b%numBody_max   = obs_a%numBody_max
2602
2603      if(associated(obs_a%headerIndex_mpiglobal)) then
2604        write(*,*) 'obs_copy: copying headerIndex_mpiglobal'
2605        if(associated(obs_b%headerIndex_mpiglobal)) then
2606          deallocate(obs_b%headerIndex_mpiglobal)
2607        endif
2608        allocate(obs_b%headerIndex_mpiglobal(size(obs_a%headerIndex_mpiglobal)))
2609        obs_b%headerIndex_mpiglobal(:) = obs_a%headerIndex_mpiglobal(:)
2610      endif
2611
2612      if(associated(obs_a%bodyIndex_mpiglobal)) then
2613        write(*,*) 'obs_copy: copying bodyIndex_mpiglobal'
2614        if(associated(obs_b%bodyIndex_mpiglobal)) then
2615          deallocate(obs_b%bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
2616        endif
2617        allocate(obs_b%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(size(obs_a%bodyIndex_mpiglobal)))
2618        obs_b%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(:) = obs_a%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(:)
2619      endif
2620
2621      obs_b%mpi_local     = obs_a%mpi_local
2622   end subroutine obs_copy
2623
2624
2625   subroutine obs_deallocate(obsdat)
2626      !
2627      !:Purpose:
2628      !      De-allocate arrays.  This is a private method.
2629      !
2630      implicit none
2631
2632      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
2633
2634      integer :: ierr
2635      integer :: column_index
2636
2637      if(.not.obsdat%allocated) then
2638         ! The object content has already been de-allocated.  Don't repeat it.
2639         return
2640      endif
2641
2642      obsdat%allocated=.false.
2643      HEADER:if(obsdat%numHeader_max > 0) then
2644         if (associated(obsdat%headerPrimaryKey)) then
2645            deallocate(obsdat%headerPrimaryKey,STAT=ierr)
2646            nullify(obsdat%headerPrimaryKey)
2647            if(ierr /= 0)write(*,*) 'Problem detected with headerPrimaryKey. IERR =',ierr
2648         end if
2649          
2650         if (associated(obsdat%cfamily)) then
2651            deallocate(obsdat%cfamily,STAT=ierr)
2652            nullify(obsdat%cfamily)
2653            if(ierr /= 0)write(*,*) 'Problem detected with CFAMILY. IERR =',ierr
2654         end if
2655
2656         if (associated(obsdat%cstnid))then
2657            deallocate(obsdat%cstnid,STAT=ierr)
2658            nullify(obsdat%cstnid)
2659            if(ierr /= 0)write(*,*) 'Problem detected with CSTNID. IERR =',ierr
2660         end if
2661
2662         if (associated(obsdat%realHeaders%columns))then
2663            do column_index=NHDR_REAL_BEG,NHDR_REAL_END
2664               if(obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index)) &
2665                  call odc_deallocate(obsdat%realHeaders%columns(column_index))
2666            enddo
2667         end if
2668
2669         if (associated(obsdat%intHeaders%columns))then
2670            do column_index=NHDR_INT_BEG,NHDR_INT_END
2671               if(obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index)) &
2672                  call odc_deallocate(obsdat%intHeaders%columns(column_index))
2673            enddo
2674         end if
2675
2676         deallocate(obsdat%scratchRealHeader)
2677         nullify   (obsdat%scratchRealHeader)
2678
2679         deallocate(obsdat%scratchIntHeader)
2680         nullify   (obsdat%scratchIntHeader)
2681      endif HEADER
2682
2683      BODY:if(obsdat%numBody_max > 0) then
2684         if (associated(obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey)) then
2685            deallocate(obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey,STAT=ierr)
2686            nullify(obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey)
2687            if(ierr /= 0)write(*,*) 'Problem detected with bodyPrimaryKey. IERR =',ierr
2688         end if
2689
2690         if (associated(obsdat%realBodies%columns))then
2691            do column_index=NBDY_REAL_BEG,NBDY_REAL_END
2692               if(obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index)) &
2693                  call odc_deallocate(obsdat%realBodies%columns(column_index))
2694            enddo
2695         end if
2696
2697         if (associated(obsdat%intBodies%columns))then
2698            do column_index=NBDY_INT_BEG,NBDY_INT_END
2699               if(obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour%columnActive(column_index)) &
2700                  call odc_deallocate(obsdat%intBodies%columns(column_index))
2701            enddo
2702         end if
2703
2704         deallocate(obsdat%scratchRealBody)
2705         nullify   (obsdat%scratchRealBody)
2706
2707         deallocate(obsdat%scratchIntBody)
2708         nullify   (obsdat%scratchIntBody)
2709      endif BODY
2710
2711      obsdat%numHeader_max=0
2712      obsdat%numBody_max=0
2713
2714      call ild_finalize(obsdat%header_index_list_depot)
2715      call ild_finalize(obsdat%body_index_list_depot)
2716
2717   end subroutine obs_deallocate
2718
2719
2720   function obs_elem_c(obsdat,name,row_index) result(value)
2721      !
2722      !:Purpose: Get a character-string-valued observation-data element.
2723      !      To control access to the observation object.  Returns the
2724      !      (character) value of the ObsData element with the indicated name
2725      !      and row_index.
2726      !
2727      implicit none
2728
2729      character(len=12) :: value
2730      type(struct_obs), intent(in)  :: obsdat
2731      character(len=*), intent(in)  :: name
2732      integer         , intent(in)  :: row_index
2733
2734      select case (trim(name))
2735      case ('STID'); value=obsdat%cstnid(row_index)
2736
2737      case default
2738         call obs_abort('ERROR:  ' // name(1:4) // &
2739                        ' is not a character(len=*) observation.');return
2740      end select
2741   end function obs_elem_c

2744   subroutine obs_enkf_prntbdy(obsdat,kstn,kulout)
2745      !
2746      !:Purpose:  print all data records associated with an observation
2747      !
2748      !:Arguments:
2749      !     :kstn: no. of station 
2750      !     :kulout: unit used for printing
2751      !
2752      implicit none
2753
2754      type(struct_obs), intent(in) :: obsdat
2755      integer,      intent(in)  :: kstn, kulout
2756
2757      integer :: ipnt, idata, idata2, jdata, var3d
2758
2759      ! general information
2760
2761      ipnt  = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, kstn)
2762      idata = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, kstn)
2763
2764      if(idata == 1) then
2765         write(kulout,fmt=9101)idata,kstn
2766      else
2767         write(kulout,fmt=9100)idata,kstn
2768      end if
27699100  format(2x,'there are ',i6,1x,'data in record no.',1x,i6)
27709101  format(2x,'there is ', i6,1x,'data in record no.',1x,i6)
2771
2772      ! print all data records
2773
2774      write(kulout,'(a,a,a,a)') '   no.   var.  press. ass observ. ', &
2775         '  o minus p  o minus p6  o minus a   o min a0     obserr. root(hpht) ', &
2776         'root(haht) innov std dev obs std dev   acc ', &
2777         'zhad  vco'
2778      do jdata = ipnt, ipnt + idata - 1
2779         idata2 = jdata -ipnt + 1
2780         if (btest(obsdat%intBodies%columns(OBS_FLG)%value_i(jdata),12)) then 
2781            var3d=1
2782         else
2783            var3d=0
2784         endif
2785
2786         write(kulout,fmt=9201) idata2,obsdat%intBodies%columns(OBS_VNM)%value_i(jdata), &
2787            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_PPP )%value_r(jdata), &
2788            obsdat%intBodies%columns(OBS_ASS )%value_i(jdata), &
2789            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_VAR )%value_r(jdata), &
2790            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_OMP )%value_r(jdata), &
2791            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_OMP6)%value_r(jdata), &
2792            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_OMA )%value_r(jdata), &
2793            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_OMA0)%value_r(jdata), &
2794            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_OER )%value_r(jdata), &
2795            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_HPHT)%value_r(jdata), &
2796            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_HAHT)%value_r(jdata), &
2797            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_SIGI)%value_r(jdata), &
2798            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_SIGO)%value_r(jdata), &
2799            var3d, &
2800            obsdat%realBodies%columns(OBS_ZHA )%value_r(jdata), &
2801            obsdat%intBodies%columns(OBS_VCO )%value_i(jdata)
2802      enddo
2803
28049201  format(1x,i6,1x,i6,1x,f7.0,1x,i3,10(1x,f10.3),1x,i2, &
2805           1x,f10.3,1x,i2)
2806
2807      return
2808
2809   end subroutine obs_enkf_prntbdy

2812   subroutine obs_enkf_prnthdr(obsdata,kobs,kulout)
2813      !
2814      !:Purpose: printing of the header of an observation record
2815      !
2816      !:Arguments:
2817      !           :kobs: no. of observation
2818      !           :kulout: unit used for optional printing
2819      !
2820      implicit none
2821
2822      type(struct_obs), intent(in) :: obsdata
2823      integer,      intent(in)  :: kobs, kulout
2824
2825      integer :: obsRLN, obsONM, obsDAT, obsETM, obsINS, obsOTP, obsITY
2826      integer :: obsNLV, obsPAS, obsREG, obsIP
2827      real(pre_obsReal) ::obsLAT, obsLON, obsALT, obsBX, obsBY, obsBZ, obsAZA
2828
2829      ! general information
2830
2831      write(kulout,fmt=9100)kobs,obsdata%cstnid(KOBS)
28329100  format(//,2x,'-- observation record no.' &
2833         ,1x,i6,3x,' station id:',A12)
2834
2835      ! print header's content
2836
28379202  format(2x,'position within realBodies:',i6)
2838      obsRLN = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_RLN, kobs)
2839      obsONM = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_ONM, kobs)
2840      obsDAT = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_DAT, kobs)
2841      obsETM = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_ETM, kobs)
2842      obsINS = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_INS, kobs)
2843      obsOTP = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_OTP, kobs)
2844      obsITY = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_ITY, kobs)
2845      obsLAT = obs_headElem_r(obsdata, OBS_LAT, kobs)
2846      obsLON = obs_headElem_r(obsdata, OBS_LON, kobs)
2847      obsALT = obs_headElem_r(obsdata, OBS_ALT, kobs)
2848      obsBX  = obs_headElem_r(obsdata, OBS_BX , kobs)
2849      obsBY  = obs_headElem_r(obsdata, OBS_BY , kobs)
2850      obsBZ  = obs_headElem_r(obsdata, OBS_BZ , kobs)
2851      obsAZA = obs_headElem_r(obsdata, OBS_AZA, kobs)
2852      write(kulout,fmt=9200) obsRLN, obsONM, obsDAT, obsETM, &
2853           obsINS, obsOTP, obsITY, obsLAT, obsLON, obsALT, &
2854           obsBX , obsBY , obsBZ , obsAZA
2855
2856      obsNLV = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_NLV, kobs)
2857      obsPAS = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_PAS, kobs)
2858      obsREG = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_REG, kobs)
2859      obsIP  = obs_headElem_i(obsdata, OBS_IP , kobs)
2860      write(kulout,fmt=9201) obsNLV, obsPAS, obsREG, obsIP
2861         
2862
28639200  format(2x,'position within realBodies:',i8,1x,'stn. number:',i6,1x,/, &
2864         '  date: ',i10,1x,' time: ',i8,/, &
2865         '  model box:',i12,1x,'instrument: ',i6,1x, &
2866         'obs. type:',i8,1x,/, &
2867         '  (lat,lon):',f12.6,1x,f12.6,1x, &
2868         'stations altitude:',f12.6,1x,/,2x, &
2869         'block location: ',3(f12.6,1x),/,2x, &
2870         'azimuth angle:',f12.6)
28719201  format('  number of data:',i6,1x, &
2872         ' pass: ',i6,' region: ',i6,/,2x,'processor: ',i6)
2873
2874      return
2875   end subroutine obs_enkf_prnthdr
2876
2877
2878   subroutine obs_expandToMpiGlobal(obsdat)
2879      !
2880      !:Purpose: restore Global array realBodies and intBodies.
2881      !      To reconstitute the mpi-global observation object by gathering the
2882      !      necessary data from all processors (to all processors).
2883      !
2884      !:Note: for the character data cstnid(:), this is converted to integers
2885      !       with IACHAR and back to characters with ACHAR, to facilitate this
2886      !       gather through rpn_comm_allreduce
2887      !
2888      implicit none
2889
2890      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
2891
2892      integer, allocatable :: headerIndex_mpiglobal(:),all_headerIndex_mpiglobal(:,:)
2893      integer, allocatable :: bodyIndex_mpiglobal(:),all_bodyIndex_mpiglobal(:,:)
2894      integer(8), allocatable :: headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(:), all_headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(:,:)
2895      integer(8), allocatable :: bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(:), all_bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(:,:)
2896      integer, allocatable :: intHeaders_mpilocal(:,:),all_intHeaders_mpilocal(:,:,:)
2897      real(pre_obsReal), allocatable :: realHeaders_mpilocal(:,:),all_realHeaders_mpilocal(:,:,:)
2898      integer, allocatable :: intStnid_mpilocal(:,:),all_intStnid_mpilocal(:,:,:)
2899      integer, allocatable :: intFamily_mpilocal(:,:),all_intFamily_mpilocal(:,:,:)
2900      integer, allocatable :: intBodies_mpilocal(:,:),all_intBodies_mpilocal(:,:,:)
2901      integer, allocatable :: all_numHeader_mpilocal(:), all_numBody_mpilocal(:)
2902      real(pre_obsReal), allocatable :: realBodies_mpilocal(:,:),all_realBodies_mpilocal(:,:,:)
2903
2904      integer :: ierr
2905      integer :: get_max_rss
2906      integer :: numHeader_mpilocalmax,numBody_mpilocalmax
2907      integer :: numHeader_mpiGlobal,numBody_mpiGlobal
2908      integer :: numHeader_mpilocal, numBody_mpilocal
2909      integer :: bodyIndex_mpilocal,bodyIndex
2910      integer :: headerIndex_mpilocal,headerIndex
2911      integer :: headerIndexOffset,bodyIndexOffset
2912      integer :: nsize,sourcePE,nprocs_mpi,myid_mpi,procIndex
2913      integer :: charIndex,activeIndex,columnIndex
2914      !!---------------------------------------------------------------
2915
2916      write(*,*) 'Entering obs_expandToMpiGlobal'
2917      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
2918
2919      if(.not. obsdat%mpi_local)then
2920         call obs_abort('OBS_EXPANDTOMPIGLOBAL has been called, but the ' &
2921                        // 'obsSpaceData object is already in mpi-global state')
2922         return
2923      endif
2924
2925      ! determine rank and number of mpi tasks
2926      call rpn_comm_size("GRID",nprocs_mpi,ierr)
2927      call rpn_comm_rank("GRID",myid_mpi,ierr)
2928
2929      ! determine number of rows in mpiglobal arrays
2930      numHeader_mpiGlobal = obs_numHeader_mpiglobal(obsdat)
2931      numBody_mpiGlobal   = obs_numBody_mpiglobal  (obsdat)
2932
2933      ! determine number of rows in mpilocal arrays
2934      numHeader_mpilocal = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
2935      numBody_mpilocal   = obs_numBody(obsdat)
2936
2937      ! construct the header/body mpiglobal indices if they do not exist
2938      if ( .not. associated(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal) ) then
2939         write(*,*) 'obs_expandToMpiGlobal: This object was never mpiglobal. ' // &
2940                    'Just gather the body and header rows in a simple way.'
2941
2942         if(numHeader_mpilocal > 0) then
2943            ! Allocate the list of global header indices
2944            allocate(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(numHeader_mpilocal))
2945            obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(:)=0
2946         else
2947            nullify(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal)
2948            write(*,*) 'obs_expandToMpiGlobal: This mpi processor has zero headers.'
2949         end if
2950
2951         if(numBody_mpilocal > 0) then
2952            ! Allocate the list of global body indices
2953            allocate(obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(numBody_mpilocal))
2954            obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(:)=0
2955         else
2956            nullify(obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
2957            write(*,*) 'obs_expandToMpiGlobal: This mpi processor has zero bodies.'
2958         endif
2959
2960         allocate( all_numHeader_mpilocal(nprocs_mpi) )
2961         call rpn_comm_allgather(numHeader_mpilocal,     1, "mpi_integer", &
2962                                 all_numHeader_mpilocal, 1, "mpi_integer", &
2963                                 "GRID",ierr)
2964         allocate( all_numBody_mpilocal(nprocs_mpi) )
2965         call rpn_comm_allgather(numBody_mpilocal,     1, "mpi_integer", &
2966                                 all_numBody_mpilocal, 1, "mpi_integer", &
2967                                 "GRID",ierr)
2968
2969         headerIndexOffset = 0
2970         bodyIndexOffset = 0
2971         do procIndex = 1, myid_mpi
2972            headerIndexOffset = headerIndexOffset + all_numHeader_mpilocal(procIndex)
2973            bodyIndexOffset   = bodyIndexOffset   + all_numBody_mpilocal(procIndex)
2974         end do
2975
2976         do headerIndex = 1, numHeader_mpilocal
2977            obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex) = headerIndex + headerIndexOffset
2978         end do
2979
2980         do bodyIndex = 1, numBody_mpilocal
2981            obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(bodyIndex) = bodyIndex + bodyIndexOffset
2982         end do
2983
2984      end if ! construct mpiglobal indices
2985
2986      ! first set the mpiglobal header index value stored in the body table
2987      do bodyIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numBody
2988         headerIndex_mpilocal=obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex_mpilocal)
2989         call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex_mpilocal, &
2990            obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal))
2991      enddo
2992
2993      ! gather the lists of mpiglobal header indices on proc 0 to know where everything goes
2994      call rpn_comm_allreduce(obsdat%numHeader,numHeader_mpilocalmax,1,"mpi_integer","mpi_max","GRID",ierr)
2995      allocate(headerIndex_mpiglobal(numHeader_mpilocalmax))
2996      headerIndex_mpiglobal(:)=0
2997      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numHeader
2998         headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal)=obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal)
2999      enddo
3000
3001      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3002         allocate(all_headerIndex_mpiglobal(numHeader_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3003      else
3004         allocate(all_headerIndex_mpiglobal(1,1))
3005      end if
3006
3007      call rpn_comm_gather(headerIndex_mpiglobal    ,numHeader_mpilocalmax,"mpi_integer", &
3008                           all_headerIndex_mpiglobal,numHeader_mpilocalmax,"mpi_integer", &
3009                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3010      deallocate(headerIndex_mpiglobal)
3011      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3012
3013      ! make the header primary key mpiglobal
3014      allocate(headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(numHeader_mpilocalmax))
3015      headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(:) = 0
3016      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numHeader
3017         headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(headerIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3018            obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex_mpilocal)
3019      enddo
3020      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3021         allocate(all_headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(numHeader_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3022      else
3023         allocate(all_headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(1,1))
3024      end if
3025      nsize=size(headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal)
3026      call rpn_comm_gather(headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal    ,nsize,"mpi_integer8", &
3027                           all_headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal,nsize,"mpi_integer8", &
3028                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3029      deallocate(headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal)
3030      
3031      ! make header-level integer data mpiglobal
3032      allocate(intHeaders_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders),numHeader_mpilocalmax))
3033      intHeaders_mpilocal(:,:)=0
3034      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numHeader
3035         do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
3036            columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
3037                                     obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour, activeIndex)
3038            intHeaders_mpilocal(activeIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3039               obs_headElem_i(obsdat, columnIndex, headerIndex_mpilocal)
3040         enddo
3041      enddo
3042
3043      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3044         allocate(all_intHeaders_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders),numHeader_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3045      else
3046         allocate(all_intHeaders_mpilocal(1,1,1))
3047      end if
3048
3049      nsize=size(intHeaders_mpilocal)
3050      call rpn_comm_gather(intHeaders_mpilocal    ,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3051                           all_intHeaders_mpilocal,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3052                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3053      deallocate(intHeaders_mpilocal)
3054      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3055
3056      ! make header-level real data mpiglobal
3057      allocate(realHeaders_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders),numHeader_mpilocalmax))
3058      realHeaders_mpilocal(:,:)=real(0.0d0,pre_obsReal)
3059      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numHeader
3060         do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
3061            columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
3062                                     obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour, activeIndex)
3063            realHeaders_mpilocal(activeIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3064               obs_headElem_r(obsdat, columnIndex, headerIndex_mpilocal)
3065         enddo
3066      enddo
3067      
3068      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3069         allocate(all_realHeaders_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders),numHeader_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3070      else
3071         allocate(all_realHeaders_mpilocal(1,1,1))
3072      end if
3073
3074      nsize=size(realHeaders_mpilocal)
3075      call rpn_comm_gather(realHeaders_mpilocal    ,nsize,pre_obsMpiReal, &
3076                           all_realHeaders_mpilocal,nsize,pre_obsMpiReal, &
3077                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3078      deallocate(realHeaders_mpilocal)
3079      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3080
3081      ! make station-id data mpiglobal
3082      allocate(intStnid_mpilocal(len(obsdat%cstnid(1)),numHeader_mpilocalmax))
3083      intStnid_mpilocal(:,:)=0
3084      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numHeader
3085         do charIndex=1,len(obsdat%cstnid(1))
3086            intStnid_mpilocal(charIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3087               iachar(obsdat%cstnid(headerIndex_mpilocal)(charIndex:charIndex))
3088         enddo
3089      enddo
3090
3091      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3092         allocate(all_intStnid_mpilocal(len(obsdat%cstnid(1)),numHeader_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3093      else
3094         allocate(all_intStnid_mpilocal(1,1,1))
3095      end if
3096
3097      nsize=size(intStnid_mpilocal)
3098      call rpn_comm_gather(intStnid_mpilocal    ,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3099                           all_intStnid_mpilocal,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3100                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3101      deallocate(intStnid_mpilocal)
3102      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3103
3104      ! make obs family data mpiglobal
3105      allocate(intFamily_mpilocal(len(obsdat%cfamily(1)),numHeader_mpilocalmax))
3106      intFamily_mpilocal(:,:)=0
3107      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numHeader
3108         do charIndex=1,len(obsdat%cfamily(1))
3109            intFamily_mpilocal(charIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3110               iachar(obsdat%cfamily(headerIndex_mpilocal)(charIndex:charIndex))
3111         enddo
3112      enddo
3113
3114      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3115         allocate(all_intFamily_mpilocal(len(obsdat%cfamily(1)),numHeader_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3116      else
3117         allocate(all_intFamily_mpilocal(1,1,1))
3118      end if
3119
3120      nsize=size(intFamily_mpilocal)
3121      call rpn_comm_gather(intFamily_mpilocal    ,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3122                           all_intFamily_mpilocal,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3123                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3124      deallocate(intFamily_mpilocal)
3125      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3126
3127      ! gather the lists of mpiglobal body indices on proc 0 to know where everything goes
3128      call rpn_comm_allreduce(obsdat%numBody,numBody_mpilocalmax,1,"mpi_integer","mpi_max","GRID",ierr)
3129      allocate(bodyIndex_mpiglobal(numBody_mpilocalmax))
3130      bodyIndex_mpiglobal(:)=0
3131      do bodyIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numBody
3132         bodyIndex_mpiglobal(bodyIndex_mpilocal)=obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(bodyIndex_mpilocal)
3133      enddo
3134
3135      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3136         allocate(all_bodyIndex_mpiglobal(numBody_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3137      else
3138         allocate(all_bodyIndex_mpiglobal(1,1))
3139      end if
3140
3141      call rpn_comm_gather(bodyIndex_mpiglobal    ,numBody_mpilocalmax,"mpi_integer", &
3142                           all_BodyIndex_mpiglobal,numBody_mpilocalmax,"mpi_integer", &
3143                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3144      deallocate(bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
3145      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3146
3147      ! make body primary key mpiglobal
3148      allocate(bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(numBody_mpilocalmax))
3149      bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(:)=0
3150      do bodyIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numBody
3151         bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(bodyIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3152            obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey(bodyIndex_mpilocal)
3153      enddo
3154      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3155         allocate(all_bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(numBody_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3156      else
3157         allocate(all_bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(1,1))
3158      end if
3159      nsize=size(bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal)
3160      call rpn_comm_gather(bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal    ,nsize,"mpi_integer8", &
3161                           all_bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal,nsize,"mpi_integer8", &
3162                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3163      deallocate(bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal)
3164
3165      ! make body-level integer data mpiglobal
3166      allocate(intBodies_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies),numBody_mpilocalmax))
3167      intBodies_mpilocal(:,:)=0
3168      do bodyIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numBody
3169         do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
3170            columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
3171                                     obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour, activeIndex)
3172            intBodies_mpilocal(activeIndex,bodyIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3173               obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, columnIndex, bodyIndex_mpilocal)
3174         enddo
3175      enddo
3176
3177      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3178         allocate(all_intBodies_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies),numBody_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3179      else
3180         allocate(all_intBodies_mpilocal(1,1,1))
3181      end if
3182
3183      nsize=size(intBodies_mpilocal)
3184      call rpn_comm_gather(intBodies_mpilocal    ,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3185                           all_intBodies_mpilocal,nsize,"mpi_integer", &
3186                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3187      deallocate(intBodies_mpilocal)
3188      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3189
3190      ! make body-level real data mpiglobal
3191      allocate(realBodies_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies),numBody_mpilocalmax))
3192      realBodies_mpilocal(:,:)=real(0.0d0,pre_obsReal)
3193      do bodyIndex_mpilocal=1,obsdat%numBody
3194         do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
3195            columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
3196                                     obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour, activeIndex)
3197            realBodies_mpilocal(activeIndex,bodyIndex_mpilocal)=  &
3198               obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, columnIndex, bodyIndex_mpilocal)
3199         enddo
3200      enddo
3201
3202      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3203         allocate(all_realBodies_mpilocal(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies),numBody_mpilocalmax,0:nprocs_mpi-1))
3204      else
3205         allocate(all_realBodies_mpilocal(1,1,1))
3206      end if
3207
3208      nsize=size(realBodies_mpilocal)
3209      call rpn_comm_gather(realBodies_mpilocal    ,nsize,pre_obsMpiReal, &
3210                           all_realBodies_mpilocal,nsize,pre_obsMpiReal, &
3211                           0,"GRID",ierr)
3212      deallocate(realBodies_mpilocal)
3213      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3214
3215      ! destroy object's mpilocal data and allocate mpiglobal data
3216      call obs_deallocate(obsdat)
3217
3218      ! Only processor 0 does any work hereafter
3219      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3220          call obs_allocate(obsdat,numHeader_mpiGlobal,numBody_mpiGlobal)
3221      else
3222          call obs_allocate(obsdat,0,0)
3223      endif
3224
3225      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3226
3227      if(myid_mpi == 0) then
3228
3229         do sourcePE=0,nprocs_mpi-1
3230            do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,numHeader_mpilocalmax
3231               ! grab the mpiglobal header index
3232               headerIndex=all_headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3233               if(headerIndex > 0) then
3234
3235                  obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex)= &
3236                         all_headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal(headerIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3237
3238                  do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
3239                     columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour,activeIndex)
3240                     obsdat%realHeaders%columns(columnIndex)%value_r(headerIndex)= &
3241                            all_realHeaders_mpilocal(activeIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3242                  enddo
3243
3244                  do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
3245                     columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,activeIndex)
3246                     obsdat%intHeaders%columns(columnIndex)%value_i(headerIndex)= &
3247                            all_intHeaders_mpilocal(activeIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3248                  enddo
3249
3250                  do charIndex=1,len(obsdat%cstnid(1))
3251                     obsdat%cstnid(headerIndex)(charIndex:charIndex) = &
3252                       achar(all_intStnid_mpilocal(charIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE))
3253                  enddo
3254
3255                  do charIndex=1,len(obsdat%cfamily(1))
3256                     obsdat%cfamily(headerIndex)(charIndex:charIndex) = &
3257                        achar(all_intFamily_mpilocal(charIndex,headerIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE))
3258                  enddo
3259
3260               endif
3261            enddo
3262         enddo
3263
3264         do sourcePE=0,nprocs_mpi-1
3265            do bodyIndex_mpilocal=1,numBody_mpilocalmax
3266               bodyIndex=all_bodyIndex_mpiglobal(bodyIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3267               if(bodyIndex > 0) then
3268
3269                  obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey(bodyIndex)=  &
3270                     all_bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal(bodyIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3271
3272                  do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
3273                     columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour,activeIndex)
3274                     obsdat%realBodies%columns(columnIndex)%value_r(bodyIndex)= &
3275                        all_realBodies_mpilocal(activeIndex,bodyIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3276                  enddo
3277
3278                  do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
3279                     columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour,activeIndex)
3280                     obsdat%intBodies%columns(columnIndex)%value_i(bodyIndex)=  &
3281                        all_intBodies_mpilocal(activeIndex,bodyIndex_mpilocal,sourcePE)
3282                  enddo
3283
3284               endif
3285            enddo
3286         enddo
3287 
3288
3289         ! Make RLN point to global data
3290         do headerIndex=1,numHeader_mpiGlobal
3291            if(headerIndex == 1) then
3292               obsdat%intHeaders%columns(OBS_RLN)%value_i(headerIndex) = 1
3293            else
3294               obsdat%intHeaders%columns(OBS_RLN)%value_i(headerIndex) = &
3295                   obsdat%intHeaders%columns(OBS_RLN)%value_i(headerIndex-1) + &
3296                   obsdat%intHeaders%columns(OBS_NLV)%value_i(headerIndex-1)
3297            endif
3298         enddo
3299
3300         obsdat%numBody     =  numBody_mpiGlobal
3301         obsdat%numHeader   =numHeader_mpiGlobal
3302
3303      else
3304
3305         obsdat%numBody     = 0
3306         obsdat%numHeader   = 0
3307
3308      endif ! myid_mpi == 0
3309
3310      ! deallocate the complete temporary arrays
3311      deallocate(all_headerIndex_mpiglobal)
3312      deallocate(all_bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
3313      deallocate(all_headerPrimaryKey_mpilocal)
3314      deallocate(all_bodyPrimaryKey_mpilocal)
3315      deallocate(all_intStnid_mpilocal)
3316      deallocate(all_intFamily_mpilocal)
3317      deallocate(all_intHeaders_mpilocal)
3318      deallocate(all_realHeaders_mpilocal)
3319      deallocate(all_intBodies_mpilocal)
3320      deallocate(all_realBodies_mpilocal)
3321
3322      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
3323      obsdat%mpi_local = .false.
3324      write(*,*) 'Leaving obs_expandToMpiGlobal'
3325      return
3326   end subroutine obs_expandToMpiGlobal
3327

3389   subroutine obs_extractObsRealHeaderColumn(realHeaderColumn, obsSpaceData, obsColumnIndex)
3390     !:Purpose: Extract contents of a real header column into a vector. Note
3391     !           that the output can be either in the form of a vector with
3392     !           length equal to the number of rows in the body OR header table.
3393     !
3394     implicit none
3395
3396     ! arguments
3397     real(pre_obsReal), intent(out) :: realHeaderColumn(:)
3398     type(struct_obs)     :: obsSpaceData
3399     integer              :: obsColumnIndex
3400
3401     ! locals
3402     integer :: bodyIndex, headerIndex
3403
3404     if (size(realHeaderColumn) == obs_numBody(obsSpaceData)) then
3405       do bodyIndex = 1, obs_numBody(obsSpaceData)
3406         headerIndex = obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex)
3407         realHeaderColumn(bodyIndex) = obs_headElem_r(obsSpaceData,obsColumnIndex,headerIndex)
3408       end do
3409     else if(size(realHeaderColumn) == obs_numHeader(obsSpaceData)) then
3410       do headerIndex = 1, obs_numHeader(obsSpaceData)
3411         realHeaderColumn(headerIndex) = obs_headElem_r(obsSpaceData,obsColumnIndex,headerIndex)
3412       end do
3413     else
3414       call obs_abort('extractObsRealHeaderColumn: size of output vector invalid')
3415     end if
3416
3417   end subroutine obs_extractObsRealHeaderColumn
3418

3690   subroutine obs_initialize(obsdat, numHeader_max, numBody_max, mpi_local, &
3691                             silent)
3692      !
3693      !:Purpose: Set an observation-data module to a known state.
3694      !      Initialize object variables, and allocate arrays according to the
3695      !      parameters, header_max and body_max.
3696      !
3697      implicit none
3698                                        ! instance of obsSpaceData
3699      type(struct_obs),intent(inout):: obsdat !inout allows detection of 2nd call
3700                                        ! number of header elements allocated
3701      integer, optional, intent(in) :: numHeader_max
3702                                        ! total no. of body elements allocated
3703      integer, optional, intent(in) :: numBody_max
3704      logical, optional, intent(in) :: mpi_local
3705      logical, optional, intent(in) :: silent
3706
3707      logical :: silent_
3708      integer :: nulnam,fnom,fclos,ierr
3709
3710      character(len=120) :: message
3711
3712      ! Namelist variables:
3713      integer :: nmxobs  ! maximum number of rows in 'header' table (used for initial allocation)
3714      integer :: ndatamx ! maximum number of rows in 'body' table (used for initial allocation)
3715      namelist /namdimo/nmxobs,ndatamx
3716
3717      if(.not. obs_class_initialized) then
3718         call obs_abort('obs_class_initialize must be called before ' // &
3719                        'obs_initialize')
3720         return
3721      end if
3722
3723      !
3724      ! INITIALIZE ALL OBJECT VARIABLES
3725      !
3726      nullify(obsdat%headerPrimaryKey)
3727      nullify(obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey)
3728      nullify(obsdat%cstnid)
3729      nullify(obsdat%cfamily)
3730
3731      obsdat%numHeader     = 0
3732      obsdat%numHeader_max = 0
3733      obsdat%numBody       = 0
3734      obsdat%numBody_max   = 0
3735
3736      if(present(mpi_local)) then
3737         obsdat%mpi_local  = mpi_local
3738      else
3739         obsdat%mpi_local  = .false.
3740      end if
3741
3742      if(present(silent)) then
3743         silent_  = silent
3744      else
3745         silent_  = .false.
3746      end if
3747
3748      nullify(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal)
3749      nullify(obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
3750
3751      !
3752      ! DETERMINE THE ARRAY DIMENSIONS
3753      !
3754      if(present(numHeader_max)) then
3755         ! numBody_max is necessarily also present
3756         nmxobs = numHeader_max
3757         ndatamx = numBody_max
3758
3759      else
3760         ! Initialize with bad values
3761         nmxobs=0
3762         ndatamx=0
3763
3764         ! Open the file, flnml
3765         nulnam=0
3766         ierr=fnom(nulnam,'./flnml','FTN+SEQ+R/O',0)
3767         if(ierr < 0) then
3768            write(message,*)'Failed to open flnml to obtain nmxobs and ndatamx:'&
3769                            // '  ierr=', ierr
3770            call obs_abort(message); return
3771         end if
3772
3773         ! Read the dimensions from a namelist
3774         read(nulnam,nml=namdimo,iostat=ierr)
3775         if(ierr /= 0) call obs_abort('obs_initialize: Error reading namelist')
3776         write(*,nml=namdimo)
3777         ierr=fclos(nulnam)
3778         ! Verify that the namelist contained values
3779         if(nmxobs <= 0 .or. ndatamx <= 0) then
3780            write(message,*)'From file, flnml, positive values were not ' &
3781                            // 'obtained for nmxobs or ndatamx:  ',nmxobs,ndatamx
3782            call obs_abort(message); return
3783         end if
3784      end if ! present(numHeader_max)
3785
3786      !
3787      ! ALLOCATE
3788      !
3789      call obs_allocate(obsdat, nmxobs, ndatamx, silent_)
3790
3791      return
3792   end subroutine obs_initialize
3793
3794
3795   subroutine obs_mpiDistributeIndices(obsdat)
3796      !
3797      !:Purpose:
3798      !  Compute headerIndex_mpiglobal and bodyIndex_mpiglobal: 
3799      !  this determines how obs are distributed over MPI processes
3800      !  and is needed for converting from mpiglobal to mpilocal and vice versa.
3801      !  The header indices are distributed following the chosen strategy,
3802      !  currently either "round robin" or by latitude bands.
3803      !
3804      !:Note: this subroutine is called before converting from mpiglobal to 
3805      !        mpilocal
3806      !
3807      !:Comments:  In principle this method could have obtained
3808      !           my_mpi_id by use'ing the module, mpi.  However, it queries
3809      !           rpn_comm for itself because the mpi module belongs to the
3810      !           3dvar code, whereas the present module is shared code.
3811      !
3812      implicit none
3813      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
3814
3815      integer :: headerIndex_mpiglobal,headerIndex_mpilocal
3816      integer ::   bodyIndex_mpiglobal,  bodyIndex_mpilocal
3817      integer :: numHeader_mpiLocal,numBody_mpiLocal,idata,idataend
3818      integer :: my_mpi_id, my_mpi_idx_dummy, my_mpi_idy_dummy
3819
3820      write(*,*) '-------- Start obs_mpiDistributeIndices ---------'
3821
3822      if(obsdat%mpi_local) then
3823         call obs_abort( &
3824                      'obs_mpiDistributeIndices: data already mpi-local, Abort!')
3825         return
3826      end if
3827
3828      call rpn_comm_mype(my_mpi_id, my_mpi_idx_dummy, my_mpi_idy_dummy)
3829
3830      ! Count number of headers and bodies for each processor
3831      numHeader_mpiLocal=0
3832      numBody_mpiLocal=0
3833      do headerIndex_mpiglobal=1,obsdat%numHeader
3834         if ( my_mpi_id == obs_headElem_i( obsdat, OBS_IP, headerIndex_mpiglobal )) then
3835            numHeader_mpiLocal = numHeader_mpiLocal + 1
3836            numBody_mpilocal = numBody_mpilocal &
3837                            +obs_headElem_i( obsdat, OBS_NLV, headerIndex_mpiglobal )
3838         end if
3839      enddo
3840      write(*,*) 'obs_mpidistributeindices: numHeader_mpiLocal,global=',  &
3841                 numHeader_mpiLocal,obsdat%numHeader
3842      write(*,*) 'obs_mpidistributeindices: numBody_mpiLocal,global=',  &
3843                 numBody_mpiLocal,obsdat%numBody
3844
3845      if ( numHeader_mpilocal > 0 ) then
3846         ! Allocate the list of global header indices
3847         allocate(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(numHeader_mpilocal))
3848         obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(:)=0
3849      else
3850         nullify(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal)
3851         write(*,*) 'This mpi processor has zero headers.'
3852      end if
3853
3854      if ( numBody_mpilocal > 0 ) then
3855         ! Allocate the list of global body indices
3856         allocate(obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(numBody_mpilocal))
3857         obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(:)=0
3858      else
3859         nullify(obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
3860         write(*,*) 'This mpi processor has zero bodies to treat'
3861      endif
3862
3863      ! determine the list of header indices
3864      headerIndex_mpilocal = 0
3865      do headerIndex_mpiglobal=1,obsdat%numHeader
3866         if ( my_mpi_id == obs_headElem_i( obsdat, OBS_IP, headerIndex_mpiglobal )) then
3867            headerIndex_mpilocal=headerIndex_mpilocal+1
3868            obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal) &
3869                                                           =headerIndex_mpiglobal
3870         endif
3871      enddo
3872
3873      ! determine the corresponding list of body indices
3874      bodyIndex_mpilocal=0
3875      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,numHeader_mpilocal
3876         headerIndex_mpiglobal=obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal)
3877         idata= obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, headerIndex_mpiglobal)
3878         idataend = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, headerIndex_mpiglobal) &
3879                  + idata -1 
3880         do bodyIndex_mpiglobal=idata,idataend 
3881            bodyIndex_mpilocal=bodyIndex_mpilocal+1 
3882            obsdat%bodyIndex_mpiglobal(bodyIndex_mpilocal) = bodyIndex_mpiglobal
3883         enddo
3884      enddo
3885
3886      write(*,*) '-------- END OF obs_mpiDistributeIndices ---------'
3887      write(*,*) ' '
3888   end subroutine obs_mpiDistributeIndices
3889
3890

3917   integer function obs_numBody_max(obsdat)
3918      !
3919      !:Purpose: returns the dimensioned mpi-local number of bodies.
3920      !      To provide the dimension for the number of bodies in the mpi-local
3921      !      observation-data object.
3922      !
3923      implicit none
3924
3925      type(struct_obs) , intent(in)  :: obsdat
3926
3927      obs_numBody_max=obsdat%numBody_max
3928   end function obs_numBody_max

4006   subroutine obs_print( obsdat, nobsout )
4007      !
4008      !:Purpose: print the contents of the obsdat to an ASCII file
4009      !
4010      !:Arguments:
4011      !           :obsdat:  obsSpaceData object
4012      !           :nobsout: unit used for printing
4013      !
4014      implicit none
4015
4016      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
4017      integer,         intent(in)    :: nobsout
4018
4019      integer :: jo
4020
4021      do jo=1,obsdat%numHeader
4022         call obs_enkf_prnthdr(obsdat,jo,nobsout)
4023         call obs_enkf_prntbdy(obsdat,jo,nobsout)
4024      enddo
4025
4026      return
4027   end subroutine obs_print

4030   subroutine obs_prntbdy( obsdat , index_header, unitout_opt )
4031      !
4032      !:Purpose: Print all data records associated with an observation
4033      !
4034      !:Arguments:
4035      !           :obsdat:  obsSpaceData object
4036      !           :index_header: index of the group of observations to be printed
4037      !           :unitout: unit number on which to print
4038      !
4039      implicit none
4040
4041      type(struct_obs), intent(in)           :: obsdat
4042      integer         , intent(in)           :: index_header
4043      integer         , intent(in), optional :: unitout_opt ! variable output unit facilitates unit testing
4044
4045      integer :: unitout_
4046
4047      integer :: ipnt, idata, idata2, jdata, ivco
4048      character(len=13) :: ccordtyp(4)
4049
4050      integer :: obsVNM, obsFLG, obsASS
4051      real(pre_obsReal) :: obsPPP, obsVAR, obsOMP, obsOMA, obsOER, obsHPHT, obsOMPE
4052
4053      if ( present( unitout_opt ) ) then
4054        unitout_ = unitout_opt
4055      else
4056        unitout_ = 6
4057      end if
4058
4059      ccordtyp(1) = 'HEIGHT      :'
4060      ccordtyp(2) = 'PRESSURE    :'
4061      ccordtyp(3) = 'CHANNEL NUM :'
4062      ccordtyp(4) = 'VCO UNDEFINED'
4063      !
4064      ! 1. General information
4065      !
4066      ipnt  = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,OBS_RLN,index_header)
4067      idata = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,OBS_NLV,index_header)
4068
4069      if ( idata == 1) then
4070        write ( unitout_, fmt=9101 ) idata, index_header, NBDY_INT_SIZE+NBDY_REAL_SIZE
4071      else
4072        write ( unitout_, fmt=9100 ) idata, index_header, NBDY_INT_SIZE+NBDY_REAL_SIZE
4073      end if
4074
40759100  format(4x,'THERE ARE ', &
4076         i3,1x,'DATA IN OBSERVATION RECORD NO.' &
4077         ,1x,i6,4x,'DATA RECORD''S LENGTH:',i6)
40789101  format(4x,'THERE IS ', &
4079         i3,1x,'DATUM IN OBSERVATION RECORD NO.' &
4080         ,1x,i6,4x,'DATA RECORD''S LENGTH:',i6)
4081      !
4082      ! 2. Print all data records
4083      !
4084      do jdata = ipnt, ipnt + idata - 1
4085        idata2 = jdata -ipnt + 1
4086        if ( obs_bodyElem_i( obsdat, OBS_ASS, jdata ) >= 0) then
4087          ivco = obs_bodyElem_i( obsdat, OBS_VCO, jdata )
4088          if ( ivco < 1 .or. ivco > 3 ) ivco = 4
4089          obsVNM = obs_bodyElem_i( obsdat, OBS_VNM , jdata )
4090          obsPPP = obs_bodyElem_r( obsdat, OBS_PPP , jdata )
4091          obsVAR = obs_bodyElem_r( obsdat, OBS_VAR , jdata )
4092          obsOMP = obs_bodyElem_r( obsdat, OBS_OMP , jdata )
4093          obsOMA = obs_bodyElem_r( obsdat, OBS_OMA , jdata )
4094          obsOER = obs_bodyElem_r( obsdat, OBS_OER , jdata )
4095          obsHPHT= obs_bodyElem_r( obsdat, OBS_HPHT, jdata )
4096          obsOMPE= obs_bodyElem_r( obsdat, OBS_OMPE, jdata )
4097          obsFLG = obs_bodyElem_i( obsdat, OBS_FLG , jdata )
4098          obsASS = obs_bodyElem_i( obsdat, OBS_ASS , jdata )
4099          write ( unitout_, fmt=9201 ) idata2, &
4100               obsVNM, ccordtyp(ivco), &
4101               obsPPP,obsVAR,obsOMP,obsOMA, &
4102               obsOER,obsHPHT,obsOMPE,obsFLG,obsASS
4103        end if
4104      end do
4105
41069201  format(4x,'DATA NO.',i6,/,10x &
4107         ,'VARIABLE NO.:',i6,4x,a13,g13.6,4x &
4108         ,/,10x &
4109         ,'OBSERVED VALUE:',g23.16,5x,'OBSERVED - BACKGROUND VALUES:' &
4110         ,g23.16,4x &
4111         ,/,10x &
4112         ,'OBSERVED - ANALYZED VALUES:',g13.6,4x &
4113         ,/,10x &
4114         ,'ERROR STANDARD DEVIATIONS FOR' &
4115         ,/,20x &
4116         ,'OBSERVATION:',g13.6,4x &
4117         ,/,20x &
4118         ,'FIRST-GUESS:',g13.6,4x &
4119         ,/,20x &
4120         ,'OBS minus F-G:',g13.6,4x &
4121         ,/,10x &
4122         ,'BURP FLAGS:',i6,4x,'OBS. ASSIMILATED (1-->YES;0-->NO):',i3)
4123
4124      return
4125
4126   end subroutine obs_prntbdy

4130      !
4131      !:Purpose: Printing of the header of an observation record
4132      !:Arguments:
4133      !           :obsdata:  obsSpaceData object
4134      !           :index_hd: index of the header to be printed
4135      !           :unitout_opt: unit number on which to print
4136      !
4137
4138      implicit none
4139
4140
4141      type(struct_obs), intent(in)           :: obsdata
4142      integer         , intent(in)           :: index_hd
4143      integer         , intent(in), optional :: unitout_opt ! variable output unit facilitates unit testing
4144
4145      integer :: unitout_
4146      integer :: obsRLN, obsONM, obsINS, obsOTP, obsITY
4147      integer :: obsDAT, obsETM, obsNLV, obsST1, obsSTYP, obsTTYP
4148      real(pre_obsReal) :: obsLON, obsLAT, obsALT

41619100  format(//,10x,'-- OBSERVATION RECORD NO.' &

4179      obsST1 = obs_headElem_i(obsdata,OBS_ST1,index_hd)
4180      stnid  = obs_elem_c(obsdata,'STID',index_hd)
4181      write(unitout_,fmt=9200) obsRLN, obsONM, obsINS, obsOTP, obsITY, &
4182           obsLAT, obsLON, obsDAT, obsETM, stnid, obsALT, obsNLV, &
4183           obsSTYP, obsTTYP, obsST1
4184
41859200  format(6x,'Position within realBodies:',i6,1x,'OBS. NUMBER:',i6,1x &
4186         ,'INSTR. ID:',i6,1x,'OBS. TYPE:',i6,1x &
4187         ,'INSTR./RETR. TYPE:',i6,1x &
4188         ,/,6x &

4191         ,/,6x &

4200         )
