4205
4206   subroutine obs_reduceToMpiLocal(obsdat)
4207      !
4208      !:Purpose: re-construct observation data object by
4209      !          giving local Obs TAG. 
4210      !      To retain in the observation object only those data that are
4211      !      pertinent to the present mpi processor, i.e. convert from mpiglobal
4212      !      to mpilocal.
4213      !
4214      implicit none
4215
4216      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
4217
4218      ! Declare Local Variables
4219      integer(8),        allocatable,dimension(:)   :: headerPrimaryKey_tmp
4220      integer(8),        allocatable,dimension(:)   :: bodyPrimaryKey_tmp
4221      character(len=12), allocatable,dimension(:)   :: cstnid_tmp
4222      character(len=2),  allocatable,dimension(:)   :: cfamily_tmp
4223      real(pre_obsReal), allocatable,dimension(:,:) :: realHeaders_tmp
4224      real(pre_obsReal), allocatable,dimension(:,:) :: realBodies_tmp
4225
4226      integer,allocatable,dimension(:,:) :: intHeaders_tmp,intBodies_tmp
4227
4228      integer :: numHeader_mpilocal,numHeader_mpiglobal
4229      integer ::   numBody_mpilocal,  numBody_mpiglobal
4230      integer :: bodyIndex_mpilocal,bodyIndex_mpiglobal
4231      integer :: headerIndex_mpilocal,headerIndex_mpiglobal
4232      integer :: idataend,idata,active_index
4233      integer :: column_index
4234
4235      !!---------------------------------------------------------------
4236      WRITE(*,*) '============= Enter obs_reduceToMpiLocal =============='
4237
4238      if(obsdat%mpi_local)then
4239         call obs_abort('OBS_REDUCETOMPILOCAL() has been called, but the ' &
4240                        // 'obsSpaceData object is already in mpi-local state')
4241         return
4242      end if
4243
4244      if(obsdat%numHeader_max == 0)then
4245         call obs_abort('OBS_REDUCETOMPILOCAL() has been called when there are '&
4246                        // 'no data.  Obs_reduceToMpiLocal cannot be called ' &
4247                        // 'after a call to obs_expandToMpiGlobal.')
4248         return
4249      end if
4250
4251      ! compute the mpilocal lists of indices into the mpiglobal data
4252      call obs_mpiDistributeIndices(obsdat)
4253
4254      ! calculate the size of the local obs data  
4255      if(associated(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal)) then
4256         numHeader_mpilocal=size(obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal) 
4257      else
4258         numHeader_mpilocal=0
4259      endif
4260      numBody_mpiLocal=0
4261      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,numHeader_mpilocal
4262         headerIndex_mpiglobal=obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal)
4263         idata=obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, headerIndex_mpiglobal)
4264         numBody_mpiLocal = numBody_mpiLocal + idata
4265      enddo
4266
4267      numHeader_mpiGlobal = obs_numHeader(obsdat)
4268      numBody_mpiGlobal   = obs_numBody(obsdat)
4269
4270      ! allocate temporary arrays to hold mpilocal data
4271      if(numHeader_mpiLocal > 0) then
4272         allocate(headerPrimaryKey_tmp(numHeader_mpiLocal)) 
4273         allocate(cfamily_tmp(    numHeader_mpiLocal)) 
4274         allocate( cstnid_tmp(    numHeader_mpiLocal)) 
4275         allocate(realHeaders_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders), &
4276                                  numHeader_mpilocal))
4277         allocate( intHeaders_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders), &
4278                                  numHeader_mpilocal))
4279      endif
4280
4281      if(numBody_mpiLocal > 0) then
4282         allocate(bodyPrimaryKey_tmp(numBody_mpiLocal)) 
4283         allocate( realBodies_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies), &
4284                                  numBody_mpilocal))
4285         allocate(  intBodies_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies), &
4286                                  numBody_mpilocal))
4287      endif
4288
4289      ! copy the mpilocal data to temporary arrays: header-level data
4290      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,numHeader_mpilocal 
4291         headerIndex_mpiglobal=obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal)
4292
4293         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
4294            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4295                                    obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4296            realHeaders_tmp(active_index,headerIndex_mpilocal)= &
4297                      obs_headElem_r(obsdat, column_index, headerIndex_mpiglobal)
4298         enddo
4299
4300         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
4301            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4302                                     obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4303            intHeaders_tmp(active_index,headerIndex_mpilocal)= &
4304                      obs_headElem_i(obsdat, column_index, headerIndex_mpiglobal)
4305         enddo
4306
4307         headerPrimaryKey_tmp(headerIndex_mpilocal) = &
4308                obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex_mpiglobal)
4309
4310         cstnid_tmp (headerIndex_mpilocal) =obsdat%cstnid (headerIndex_mpiglobal)
4311         cfamily_tmp(headerIndex_mpilocal) =obsdat%cfamily(headerIndex_mpiglobal)
4312
4313                                        ! Make RLN point to local data
4314         if(headerIndex_mpilocal == 1) then
4315            intHeaders_tmp &
4316                (odc_activeIndexFromColumnIndex( &
4317                                        obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,OBS_RLN), &
4318                 1 &
4319                ) = 1
4320         else
4321            intHeaders_tmp &
4322                (odc_activeIndexFromColumnIndex( &
4323                                        obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,OBS_RLN), &
4324                 headerIndex_mpilocal &
4325                ) = intHeaders_tmp(odc_activeIndexFromColumnIndex( &
4326                                        obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,OBS_RLN), &
4327                                   headerIndex_mpilocal-1 &
4328                                  ) &
4329                  + intHeaders_tmp(odc_activeIndexFromColumnIndex( &
4330                                        obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,OBS_NLV), &
4331                                   headerIndex_mpilocal-1 &
4332                                  ) 
4333         endif
4334      enddo
4335
4336      ! copy the mpilocal data to temporary arrays: body-level data
4337      bodyIndex_mpilocal=0 
4338      do headerIndex_mpilocal=1,numHeader_mpilocal
4339         headerIndex_mpiglobal=obsdat%headerIndex_mpiglobal(headerIndex_mpilocal)
4340 
4341                                        ! Make HIND point to local header
4342         idata    = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN,headerIndex_mpiglobal)
4343         idataend = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV,headerIndex_mpiglobal)+idata-1
4344         do bodyIndex_mpiglobal=idata,idataend 
4345            bodyIndex_mpilocal=bodyIndex_mpilocal+1 
4346
4347            bodyPrimaryKey_tmp(bodyIndex_mpilocal)= &
4348                        obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey(bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
4349
4350            do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
4351               column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4352                                      obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
4353               realBodies_tmp(active_index,bodyIndex_mpilocal)= &
4354                        obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, column_index, bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
4355            enddo
4356
4357            do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
4358               column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4359                                       obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
4360               intBodies_tmp(active_index,bodyIndex_mpilocal)= &
4361                        obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, column_index, bodyIndex_mpiglobal)
4362            enddo
4363
4364            intBodies_tmp(odc_activeIndexFromColumnIndex( &
4365                                       obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour, OBS_HIND), &
4366                          bodyIndex_mpilocal &
4367                         ) = headerIndex_mpilocal
4368         enddo
4369      enddo
4370
4371      ! destroy object's mpiglobal data and allocate mpilocal data
4372      obsdat%numHeader=numHeader_mpiLocal
4373      obsdat%numBody=numBody_mpiLocal
4374      call obs_deallocate(obsdat)
4375      call obs_allocate(obsdat,obsdat%numHeader,obsdat%numBody)
4376
4377      ! copy all data from temporary arrays to object's arrays
4378      HEADER:if(numHeader_mpiLocal > 0) then
4379         obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(:)=headerPrimaryKey_tmp(:  ) 
4380         obsdat%cfamily(:  )=cfamily_tmp(:  ) 
4381         obsdat%cstnid (:  )= cstnid_tmp(:  )
4382         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
4383            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4384                                    obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4385            obsdat%realHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_r(:) &
4386                                                 =realHeaders_tmp(active_index,:)
4387         enddo
4388         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
4389            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4390                                     obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4391            obsdat%intHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_i(:) &
4392                                                  =intHeaders_tmp(active_index,:)
4393         enddo
4394
4395         ! deallocate temporary arrays
4396         deallocate(headerPrimaryKey_tmp)
4397         deallocate(cfamily_tmp)
4398         deallocate(cstnid_tmp)
4399         deallocate(realHeaders_tmp)
4400         deallocate(intHeaders_tmp)
4401      endif HEADER
4402
4403      BODY:if(numBody_mpiLocal > 0) then
4404         obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey(:) = bodyPrimaryKey_tmp(:)
4405         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
4406            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4407                                     obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour, active_index)
4408            obsdat%realBodies%columns(column_index)%value_r(:) &
4409                                                  =realBodies_tmp(active_index,:)
4410         enddo
4411         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
4412            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4413                                      obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour, active_index)
4414            obsdat%intBodies%columns(column_index)%value_i(:) &
4415                                                  =intBodies_tmp(active_index,:) 
4416         enddo
4417
4418         ! deallocate temporary arrays
4419         deallocate(bodyPrimaryKey_tmp)
4420         deallocate(realBodies_tmp)
4421         deallocate(intBodies_tmp)
4422      endif BODY
4423
4424
4425      obsdat%mpi_local = .true.
4426
4427      write(*,*) '============= Leave obs_reduceToMpiLocal =============='
4428
4429      return
4430   end subroutine obs_reduceToMpiLocal
4431
4432
4433   subroutine obs_squeeze( obsdat )
4434      !
4435      !:Purpose: re-construct observation data object to save memory
4436      !
4437      implicit none
4438
4439      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
4440
4441      ! Declare Local Variables
4442      integer(8),        allocatable :: headerPrimaryKey_tmp(:)
4443      integer(8),        allocatable :: bodyPrimaryKey_tmp(:)
4444      character(len=12), allocatable :: cstnid_tmp(:)
4445      character(len=2),  allocatable :: cfamily_tmp(:)
4446      real(pre_obsReal), allocatable :: realHeaders_tmp(:,:), realBodies_tmp(:,:)
4447      integer,           allocatable :: intHeaders_tmp(:,:),intBodies_tmp(:,:)
4448      integer :: bodyIndex, headerIndex, active_index, column_index
4449      integer :: idataend, idata
4450
4451      write(*,*) '============= Enter obs_squeeze =============='
4452
4453      if(obsdat%numHeader_max == obsdat%numHeader .and. &
4454         obsdat%numBody_max == obsdat%numBody)then
4455         write(*,*) 'obs_squeeze: obsdata instance is already sized correctly, do nothing'
4456         return
4457      end if
4458
4459      ! allocate temporary arrays to hold data
4460      if(obsdat%numHeader > 0) then
4461         allocate(headerPrimaryKey_tmp(obsdat%numHeader))
4462         allocate(cfamily_tmp(    obsdat%numHeader)) 
4463         allocate( cstnid_tmp(    obsdat%numHeader)) 
4464         allocate(realHeaders_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders), &
4465                                  obsdat%numHeader))
4466         allocate( intHeaders_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders), &
4467                                  obsdat%numHeader))
4468      endif
4469
4470      if(obsdat%numBody > 0) then
4471         allocate(bodyPrimaryKey_tmp(obsdat%numBody))
4472         allocate( realBodies_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies), &
4473                                  obsdat%numBody))
4474         allocate(  intBodies_tmp(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies), &
4475                                  obsdat%numBody))
4476      endif
4477
4478      ! copy the data to temporary arrays: header-level data
4479      do headerIndex=1,obsdat%numHeader 
4480         headerPrimaryKey_tmp(headerIndex)= &
4481                      obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex)
4482        
4483         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
4484            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4485                                    obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4486            realHeaders_tmp(active_index,headerIndex)= &
4487                      obs_headElem_r(obsdat, column_index, headerIndex)
4488         enddo
4489
4490         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
4491            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4492                                     obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4493            intHeaders_tmp(active_index,headerIndex)= &
4494                      obs_headElem_i(obsdat, column_index, headerIndex)
4495         enddo
4496
4497         cstnid_tmp (headerIndex) =obsdat%cstnid (headerIndex)
4498         cfamily_tmp(headerIndex) =obsdat%cfamily(headerIndex)
4499
4500      enddo
4501
4502      ! copy the data to temporary arrays: body-level data
4503      do headerIndex=1,obsdat%numHeader
4504                                        ! Make HIND point to local header
4505         idata    = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN,headerIndex)
4506         idataend = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV,headerIndex)+idata-1
4507         do bodyIndex=idata,idataend 
4508            bodyPrimaryKey_tmp(bodyIndex)= &
4509                        obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey(bodyIndex)
4510           
4511            do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
4512               column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4513                                      obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
4514               realBodies_tmp(active_index,bodyIndex)= &
4515                        obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat, column_index, bodyIndex)
4516            enddo
4517
4518            do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
4519               column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4520                                       obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour,active_index)
4521               intBodies_tmp(active_index,bodyIndex)= &
4522                        obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat, column_index, bodyIndex)
4523            enddo
4524
4525            intBodies_tmp(odc_activeIndexFromColumnIndex(obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour, OBS_HIND), &
4526                          bodyIndex) = headerIndex
4527         enddo
4528      enddo
4529
4530      ! destroy object's data and allocate at correct size data
4531      call obs_deallocate(obsdat)
4532      call obs_allocate(obsdat,obsdat%numHeader,obsdat%numBody)
4533
4534      ! copy all data from temporary arrays to object's arrays
4535      HEADER:if(obsdat%numHeader > 0) then
4536         obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(:)=headerPrimaryKey_tmp(:)
4537         obsdat%cfamily(:)=cfamily_tmp(:) 
4538         obsdat%cstnid (:)= cstnid_tmp(:)
4539         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders)
4540            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4541                                    obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4542            obsdat%realHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_r(:) &
4543                                                 =realHeaders_tmp(active_index,:)
4544         enddo
4545         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders)
4546            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4547                                     obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour, active_index)
4548            obsdat%intHeaders%columns(column_index)%value_i(:) &
4549                                                  =intHeaders_tmp(active_index,:)
4550         enddo
4551
4552         ! deallocate temporary arrays
4553         deallocate(headerPrimaryKey_tmp)
4554         deallocate(cfamily_tmp)
4555         deallocate(cstnid_tmp)
4556         deallocate(realHeaders_tmp)
4557         deallocate(intHeaders_tmp)
4558      endif HEADER
4559
4560      BODY:if(obsdat%numBody > 0) then
4561         obsdat%bodyPrimaryKey(:) = bodyPrimaryKey_tmp(:)
4562         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realBodies)
4563            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4564                                     obsdat%realBodies%odc_flavour, active_index)
4565            obsdat%realBodies%columns(column_index)%value_r(:) &
4566                                                  =realBodies_tmp(active_index,:)
4567         enddo
4568         do active_index=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intBodies)
4569            column_index=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex( &
4570                                      obsdat%intBodies%odc_flavour, active_index)
4571            obsdat%intBodies%columns(column_index)%value_i(:) &
4572                                                  =intBodies_tmp(active_index,:) 
4573         enddo
4574
4575         ! deallocate temporary arrays
4576         deallocate(bodyPrimaryKey_tmp)
4577         deallocate(realBodies_tmp)
4578         deallocate(intBodies_tmp)
4579      endif BODY
4580
4581      write(*,*) '============= Leave obs_squeeze =============='
4582
4583   end subroutine obs_squeeze
4584
4585
4586   subroutine obs_MpiRedistribute( obsdat_inout, target_ip_index )
4587      !
4588      !:Purpose: Redistribute obs over mpi tasks according to mpi task id stored 
4589      !                            in the integer header column "target_ip_index"
4590      !
4591      implicit none
4592
4593      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat_inout
4594      integer :: target_ip_index
4595
4596      ! Declare Local Variables
4597      type(struct_obs) :: obsdat_tmp
4598      integer, allocatable :: numHeaderPE_mpilocal(:), numHeaderPE_mpiglobal(:)
4599      integer, allocatable :: numBodyPE_mpilocal(:), numBodyPE_mpiglobal(:)
4600      integer,           allocatable :: intcstnid_send(:,:,:), intcstnid_recv(:,:,:)
4601      integer,           allocatable :: intcfamily_send(:,:,:), intcfamily_recv(:,:,:)
4602      integer(8),        allocatable :: primaryKey_send(:,:), primaryKey_recv(:,:)
4603      real(pre_obsReal), allocatable :: real_send(:,:,:), real_recv(:,:,:)
4604      integer,           allocatable :: int_send(:,:,:), int_recv(:,:,:), message_onm(:,:)
4605      real(pre_obsReal), allocatable :: real_send_2d(:,:), real_recv_2d(:,:)
4606      integer,           allocatable :: int_send_2d(:,:), int_recv_2d(:,:)
4607      integer :: numHeader_in, numBody_in
4608      integer :: numHeader_out, numBody_out
4609      integer :: numHeader_mpimessage, numBody_mpimessage
4610      integer :: bodyIndex, headerIndex, headerIndex_out, bodyIndex_out, columnIndex, activeIndex, procIndex, charIndex
4611      integer :: bodyIndexBeg, bodyIndexEnd
4612      integer :: nprocs_mpi, myid_mpi, ierr, nsize, target_ip
4613      logical :: needToRedistribute, needToRedistribute_mpiglobal
4614      integer :: get_max_rss
4615
4616      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
4617      write(*,*) '============= Enter obs_MpiRedistribute =============='
4618      write(*,*) 'redistribute data according to mpi task ID stored in column :', &
4619                 ocn_ColumnNameList_IH(target_ip_index)
4620
4621      ! determine rank and number of mpi tasks
4622      call rpn_comm_size("GRID",nprocs_mpi,ierr)
4623      call rpn_comm_rank("GRID",myid_mpi,ierr)
4624
4625
4626      ! Number of headers and bodies per task before redistribution
4627      numHeader_in = obs_numHeader(obsdat_inout)
4628      numBody_in   = obs_numBody(obsdat_inout)
4629
4630      ! check if redistribution is really needed
4631      needToRedistribute = .false.
4632      do headerIndex = 1, numHeader_in
4633         target_ip = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout,target_ip_index,headerIndex)
4634         if (target_ip /= myid_mpi) needToRedistribute = .true.
4635      enddo
4636      call rpn_comm_allreduce(needToRedistribute,needToRedistribute_mpiglobal,1,  &
4637                              "MPI_LOGICAL","MPI_LOR","world",ierr)
4638      if(.not.needToRedistribute_mpiglobal) then
4639         write(*,*) 'obs_MpiRedistribute: do not need to redistribute, returning'
4640         return
4641      endif
4642
4643      ! allocate arrays used for counting on each mpi task
4644      allocate(numHeaderPE_mpilocal(nprocs_mpi))
4645      allocate(numHeaderPE_mpiglobal(nprocs_mpi))
4646      allocate(numBodyPE_mpilocal(nprocs_mpi))
4647      allocate(numBodyPE_mpiglobal(nprocs_mpi))
4648
4649      ! Compute number of headers and bodies per task after redistribution
4650      numHeaderPE_mpilocal(:) = 0
4651      numBodyPE_mpilocal(:) = 0
4652      do headerIndex = 1, numHeader_in
4653         target_ip = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout,target_ip_index,headerIndex)
4654         numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) = numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) + 1
4655         numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip)   = numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip)   + obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout,OBS_NLV,headerIndex)
4656      enddo
4657      call rpn_comm_allreduce(numHeaderPE_mpilocal,numHeaderPE_mpiglobal,nprocs_mpi,  &
4658                              "MPI_INTEGER","MPI_SUM","world",ierr)
4659      call rpn_comm_allreduce(numBodyPE_mpilocal,numBodyPE_mpiglobal,nprocs_mpi,  &
4660                              "MPI_INTEGER","MPI_SUM","world",ierr)
4661      numHeader_out = numHeaderPE_mpiglobal(myid_mpi+1)
4662      numBody_out   = numBodyPE_mpiglobal(myid_mpi+1)
4663      write(*,*) 'obs_MpiRedistribute: num mpi header and body before redistribution =', numHeader_in, numBody_in
4664      write(*,*) 'obs_MpiRedistribute: num mpi header and body after redistribution  =', numHeader_out, numBody_out
4665
4666      ! Compute the max number of headers and bodies in each mpi message sent/received in the transpose
4667      call rpn_comm_allreduce(numHeaderPE_mpilocal,numHeaderPE_mpiglobal,nprocs_mpi,  &
4668                              "MPI_INTEGER","MPI_MAX","GRID",ierr)
4669      call rpn_comm_allreduce(numBodyPE_mpilocal,numBodyPE_mpiglobal,nprocs_mpi,  &
4670                              "MPI_INTEGER","MPI_MAX","GRID",ierr)
4671      if(myid_mpi == 0) write(*,*) 'obs_MpiRedistribute: num mpi header messages =', numHeaderPE_mpilocal
4672      if(myid_mpi == 0) write(*,*) 'obs_MpiRedistribute: num mpi body messages =', numBodyPE_mpilocal
4673      if(myid_mpi == 0) write(*,*) 'obs_MpiRedistribute: num mpi header messages (max) =', numHeaderPE_mpiglobal
4674      if(myid_mpi == 0) write(*,*) 'obs_MpiRedistribute: num mpi body messages (max) =', numBodyPE_mpiglobal
4675      numHeader_mpimessage = maxval(numHeaderPE_mpiglobal(:))
4676      numBody_mpimessage   = maxval(numBodyPE_mpiglobal(:))
4677
4678      call obs_initialize(obsdat_tmp,numHeader_out,  &
4679                          numBody_out,mpi_local=.true.)
4680      obsdat_tmp%numHeader = numHeader_out
4681      obsdat_tmp%numBody   = numBody_out
4682
4683      ! allocate temporary arrays to hold header-level data for mpi communication
4684      allocate(intcfamily_send(len(obsdat_inout%cfamily(1)),numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi)) 
4685      allocate(intcfamily_recv(len(obsdat_inout%cfamily(1)),numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi)) 
4686
4687      allocate(intcstnid_send(len(obsdat_inout%cstnid(1)),numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi)) 
4688      allocate(intcstnid_recv(len(obsdat_inout%cstnid(1)),numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi)) 
4689
4690      allocate(real_send(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%realHeaders), &
4691                         numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4692      allocate(real_recv(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%realHeaders), &
4693                         numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4694      allocate(int_send(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%intHeaders), &
4695                        numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4696      allocate(int_recv(odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%intHeaders), &
4697                        numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4698
4699      allocate(primaryKey_send(numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4700      allocate(primaryKey_recv(numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4701
4702      ! copy the data to temporary arrays: header-level data
4703      numHeaderPE_mpilocal(:) = 0
4704      int_send(:,:,:) = -99999
4705      do headerIndex=1,numHeader_in
4706         target_ip = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout,target_ip_index,headerIndex)
4707         numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) = numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) + 1
4708
4709         primaryKey_send(numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)= &
4710               obsdat_inout%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex)
4711
4712         do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%realHeaders)
4713            columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat_inout%realHeaders%odc_flavour, &
4714                                                       activeIndex)
4715            real_send(activeIndex,numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)= &
4716               obs_headElem_r(obsdat_inout, columnIndex, headerIndex)
4717         enddo
4718
4719         do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%intHeaders)
4720            columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat_inout%intHeaders%odc_flavour, &
4721                                                       activeIndex)
4722            int_send(activeIndex,numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)= &
4723               obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout, columnIndex, headerIndex)
4724         enddo
4725
4726         do charIndex=1, len(obsdat_inout%cstnid(1))
4727            intcstnid_send(charIndex,numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)= &
4728               iachar(obsdat_inout%cstnid(headerIndex)(charIndex:charIndex))
4729         enddo
4730
4731         do charIndex=1,len(obsdat_inout%cfamily(1))
4732            intcfamily_send(charIndex,numHeaderPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)=  &
4733               iachar(obsdat_inout%cfamily(headerIndex)(charIndex:charIndex))
4734         enddo
4735
4736      enddo
4737
4738      ! do mpi communication: header-level data
4739      if(nprocs_mpi > 1) then
4740        nsize = numHeader_mpimessage
4741        call rpn_comm_alltoall(primaryKey_send,nsize,"mpi_integer8",  &
4742                               primaryKey_recv,nsize,"mpi_integer8","GRID",ierr)
4743
4744        nsize = numHeader_mpimessage*odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%realHeaders)
4745        call rpn_comm_alltoall(real_send,nsize,"mpi_double_precision",  &
4746                               real_recv,nsize,"mpi_double_precision","GRID",ierr)
4747
4748        nsize = numHeader_mpimessage*odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%intHeaders)
4749        call rpn_comm_alltoall(int_send,nsize,"mpi_integer",  &
4750                               int_recv,nsize,"mpi_integer","GRID",ierr)
4751
4752        nsize = numHeader_mpimessage*len(obsdat_inout%cstnid(1))
4753        call rpn_comm_alltoall(intcstnid_send,nsize,"mpi_integer",  &
4754                               intcstnid_recv,nsize,"mpi_integer","GRID",ierr)
4755
4756        nsize = numHeader_mpimessage*len(obsdat_inout%cfamily(1))
4757        call rpn_comm_alltoall(intcfamily_send,nsize,"mpi_integer",  &
4758                               intcfamily_recv,nsize,"mpi_integer","GRID",ierr)
4759      else
4760        primaryKey_recv(:,1)   = primaryKey_send(:,1)
4761        real_recv(:,:,1)       = real_send(:,:,1)
4762        int_recv(:,:,1)        = int_send(:,:,1)
4763        intcstnid_recv(:,:,1)  = intcstnid_send(:,:,1)
4764        intcfamily_recv(:,:,1) = intcfamily_send(:,:,1)
4765      endif
4766
4767      allocate(message_onm(numHeader_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4768      activeIndex = odc_activeIndexFromColumnIndex(obsdat_inout%intHeaders%odc_flavour,OBS_ONM)
4769      message_onm(:,:) = int_recv(activeIndex,:,:)
4770
4771      ! copy the data from temporary arrays: header-level data
4772      headerIndex_out = 0
4773      do procIndex = 1, nprocs_mpi
4774         do headerIndex=1,numHeader_mpimessage
4775            if(int_recv(1,headerIndex,procIndex) /= -99999) then
4776               if(target_ip_index == OBS_IPF) then
4777                 ! put headers back in original order as in the files
4778                 headerIndex_out = message_onm(headerIndex,procIndex)
4779               else
4780                 headerIndex_out = headerIndex_out + 1
4781               endif
4782
4783               obsdat_tmp%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex_out)= &
4784                     primaryKey_recv(headerIndex,procIndex)
4785
4786               do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%realHeaders)
4787                  columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat_inout%realHeaders%odc_flavour, &
4788                                                             activeIndex)
4789                  obsdat_tmp%realHeaders%columns(columnIndex)%value_r(headerIndex_out)= &
4790                     real_recv(activeIndex,headerIndex,procIndex)
4791               enddo
4792
4793               do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%intHeaders)
4794                  columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat_inout%intHeaders%odc_flavour, &
4795                                                             activeIndex)
4796                  obsdat_tmp%intHeaders%columns(columnIndex)%value_i(headerIndex_out)= &
4797                     int_recv(activeIndex,headerIndex,procIndex)
4798               enddo
4799
4800               do charIndex=1, len(obsdat_inout%cstnid(1))
4801                  obsdat_tmp%cstnid(headerIndex_out)(charIndex:charIndex) = &
4802                     achar(intcstnid_recv(charIndex,headerIndex,procIndex))
4803               enddo
4804
4805               do charIndex=1, len(obsdat_inout%cfamily(1))
4806                  obsdat_tmp%cfamily(headerIndex_out)(charIndex:charIndex) = &
4807                     achar(intcfamily_recv(charIndex,headerIndex,procIndex))
4808               enddo
4809
4810            endif
4811         enddo
4812      enddo
4813
4814      ! recompute RLN to point to correct body data
4815      do headerIndex=1,numHeader_out
4816         if(headerIndex == 1) then
4817            obsdat_tmp%intHeaders%columns(OBS_RLN)%value_i(headerIndex) = 1
4818         else
4819            obsdat_tmp%intHeaders%columns(OBS_RLN)%value_i(headerIndex) = &
4820                obsdat_tmp%intHeaders%columns(OBS_RLN)%value_i(headerIndex-1) + &
4821                obsdat_tmp%intHeaders%columns(OBS_NLV)%value_i(headerIndex-1)
4822         endif
4823      enddo
4824
4825      deallocate(primaryKey_send)
4826      deallocate(primaryKey_recv)
4827      deallocate(intcfamily_send)
4828      deallocate(intcfamily_recv)
4829      deallocate(intcstnid_send)
4830      deallocate(intcstnid_recv)
4831      deallocate(real_send)
4832      deallocate(real_recv)
4833      deallocate(int_send)
4834      deallocate(int_recv)
4835
4836      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
4837
4838      ! Do communication for bodyPrimaryKey
4839
4840      allocate(primaryKey_send(numBody_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4841      allocate(primaryKey_recv(numBody_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4842
4843      numBodyPE_mpilocal(:) = 0
4844      primaryKey_send(:,:) = -99999
4845      do bodyIndex=1,numBody_in
4846         headerIndex = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat_inout,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex)
4847         target_ip = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout,target_ip_index,headerIndex)
4848         numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) = numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) + 1
4849         primaryKey_send(numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)= &
4850              obsdat_inout%bodyPrimaryKey(bodyIndex)
4851      enddo
4852      if(nprocs_mpi > 1) then
4853         nsize = numBody_mpimessage
4854         call rpn_comm_alltoall(primaryKey_send,nsize,"mpi_integer8",  &
4855                                primaryKey_recv,nsize,"mpi_integer8","GRID",ierr)
4856      else
4857         primaryKey_recv(:,1) = primaryKey_send(:,1)
4858      endif
4859      if(target_ip_index == OBS_IPF) then
4860         ! copy the data in the same order as in the original files
4861         do procIndex = 1, nprocs_mpi
4862            bodyIndex = 0
4863            do headerIndex=1,numHeader_mpimessage
4864               headerIndex_out = message_onm(headerIndex,procIndex)
4865               if(headerIndex_out /= -99999) then
4866                  bodyIndexBeg = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_RLN,headerIndex_out)
4867                  bodyIndexEnd = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_NLV,headerIndex_out) + bodyIndexBeg - 1
4868                  do bodyIndex_out = bodyIndexBeg, bodyIndexEnd
4869                     bodyIndex = bodyIndex + 1
4870                     obsdat_tmp%bodyPrimaryKey(bodyIndex_out)= &
4871                          primaryKey_recv(bodyIndex,procIndex)
4872                  enddo
4873               endif
4874            enddo
4875         enddo
4876         ! copy the data in sequential order
4877         bodyIndex_out = 0
4878         do procIndex = 1, nprocs_mpi
4879            do bodyIndex=1,numBody_mpimessage
4880               if(primaryKey_recv(bodyIndex,procIndex) /= -99999) then
4881                  bodyIndex_out = bodyIndex_out + 1
4882                  obsdat_tmp%bodyPrimaryKey(bodyIndex_out)= &
4883                       primaryKey_recv(bodyIndex,procIndex)
4884               endif
4885            enddo
4886         enddo
4887      endif
4888
4889      deallocate(primaryKey_send)
4890      deallocate(primaryKey_recv)
4891
4892      ! First do REAL body columns
4893
4894      allocate(real_send_2d(numBody_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4895      allocate(real_recv_2d(numBody_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4896
4897      do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%realBodies)
4898         columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat_inout%realBodies%odc_flavour, &
4899                                                    activeIndex)
4900
4901         ! copy the data to temporary arrays: body-level data
4902         numBodyPE_mpilocal(:) = 0
4903         real_send_2d(:,:) = -99999.0d0
4904         do bodyIndex=1,numBody_in
4905            headerIndex = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat_inout,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex)
4906            target_ip = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout,target_ip_index,headerIndex)
4907            numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) = numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) + 1
4908            real_send_2d(numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)= &
4909               obs_bodyElem_r(obsdat_inout, columnIndex, bodyIndex)
4910         enddo
4911
4912         ! do mpi communication: body-level data
4913         if(nprocs_mpi > 1) then
4914           nsize = numBody_mpimessage
4915           call rpn_comm_alltoall(real_send_2d,nsize,"mpi_double_precision",  &
4916                                  real_recv_2d,nsize,"mpi_double_precision","GRID",ierr)
4917         else
4918           real_recv_2d(:,1)       = real_send_2d(:,1)
4919         endif
4920
4921         ! copy the data from temporary arrays: body-level data
4922         if(target_ip_index == OBS_IPF) then
4923
4924            ! copy the data in the same order as in the original files
4925            do procIndex = 1, nprocs_mpi
4926               bodyIndex = 0
4927               do headerIndex=1,numHeader_mpimessage
4928                  headerIndex_out = message_onm(headerIndex,procIndex)
4929                  if(headerIndex_out /= -99999) then
4930                     bodyIndexBeg = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_RLN,headerIndex_out)
4931                     bodyIndexEnd = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_NLV,headerIndex_out) + bodyIndexBeg - 1
4932                     do bodyIndex_out = bodyIndexBeg, bodyIndexEnd
4933                        bodyIndex = bodyIndex + 1
4934                        obsdat_tmp%realBodies%columns(columnIndex)%value_r(bodyIndex_out)= &
4935                           real_recv_2d(bodyIndex,procIndex)
4936                     enddo
4937                  endif
4938               enddo
4939            enddo
4940
4941         else
4942
4943            ! copy the data in sequential order
4944            bodyIndex_out = 0
4945            do procIndex = 1, nprocs_mpi
4946               do bodyIndex=1,numBody_mpimessage
4947                  if(real_recv_2d(bodyIndex,procIndex) /= -99999.0d0) then
4948                     bodyIndex_out = bodyIndex_out + 1
4949                     obsdat_tmp%realBodies%columns(columnIndex)%value_r(bodyIndex_out)= &
4950                        real_recv_2d(bodyIndex,procIndex)
4951                  endif
4952               enddo
4953            enddo
4954
4955         endif
4956
4957      enddo ! activeIndex
4958
4959      deallocate(real_send_2d)
4960      deallocate(real_recv_2d)
4961
4962      ! Now do INTEGER body columns
4963
4964      allocate(int_send_2d(numBody_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4965      allocate(int_recv_2d(numBody_mpimessage,nprocs_mpi))
4966
4967      do activeIndex=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat_inout%intBodies)
4968         columnIndex=odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat_inout%intBodies%odc_flavour, &
4969                                                    activeIndex)
4970
4971         ! copy the data to temporary arrays: body-level data
4972         numBodyPE_mpilocal(:) = 0
4973         int_send_2d(:,:) = -99999
4974         do bodyIndex=1,numBody_in
4975            headerIndex = obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat_inout,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex)
4976            target_ip = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_inout,target_ip_index,headerIndex)
4977            numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) = numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip) + 1
4978            int_send_2d(numBodyPE_mpilocal(1+target_ip),1+target_ip)= &
4979               obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat_inout, columnIndex, bodyIndex)
4980         enddo
4981
4982         ! do mpi communication: body-level data
4983         if(nprocs_mpi > 1) then
4984           nsize = numBody_mpimessage
4985           call rpn_comm_alltoall(int_send_2d,nsize,"mpi_integer",  &
4986                                  int_recv_2d,nsize,"mpi_integer","GRID",ierr)
4987         else
4988           int_recv_2d(:,1)        = int_send_2d(:,1)
4989         endif
4990
4991         ! copy the data from temporary arrays: body-level data
4992         if(target_ip_index == OBS_IPF) then
4993
4994            ! copy the data in the same order as in the original files
4995            do procIndex = 1, nprocs_mpi
4996               bodyIndex = 0
4997               do headerIndex=1,numHeader_mpimessage
4998                  headerIndex_out = message_onm(headerIndex,procIndex)
4999                  if(headerIndex_out /= -99999) then
5000                     bodyIndexBeg = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_RLN,headerIndex_out)
5001                     bodyIndexEnd = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_NLV,headerIndex_out) + bodyIndexBeg - 1
5002                     do bodyIndex_out = bodyIndexBeg, bodyIndexEnd
5003                        bodyIndex = bodyIndex + 1
5004                        obsdat_tmp%intBodies%columns(columnIndex)%value_i(bodyIndex_out)= &
5005                           int_recv_2d(bodyIndex,procIndex)
5006                     enddo
5007                  endif
5008               enddo
5009            enddo
5010
5011         else
5012
5013            ! copy the data in sequential order
5014            bodyIndex_out = 0
5015            do procIndex = 1, nprocs_mpi
5016               do bodyIndex=1,numBody_mpimessage
5017                  if(int_recv_2d(bodyIndex,procIndex) /= -99999) then
5018                     bodyIndex_out = bodyIndex_out + 1
5019                     obsdat_tmp%intBodies%columns(columnIndex)%value_i(bodyIndex_out)= &
5020                        int_recv_2d(bodyIndex,procIndex)
5021                  endif
5022               enddo
5023            enddo
5024
5025         endif
5026
5027      enddo ! activeIndex
5028
5029      deallocate(int_send_2d)
5030      deallocate(int_recv_2d)
5031
5032      ! reset the headerIndex within the body
5033      do headerIndex = 1, obs_numheader(obsdat_tmp)
5034        bodyIndexBeg = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_RLN,headerIndex)
5035        bodyIndexEnd = obs_headElem_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_NLV,headerIndex) + bodyIndexBeg - 1
5036        do bodyIndex = bodyIndexBeg, bodyIndexEnd
5037          call obs_bodySet_i(obsdat_tmp,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex, headerIndex)
5038        enddo
5039      enddo
5040
5041      deallocate(message_onm)
5042
5043      deallocate(numHeaderPE_mpilocal)
5044      deallocate(numHeaderPE_mpiglobal)
5045      deallocate(numBodyPE_mpilocal)
5046      deallocate(numBodyPE_mpiglobal)
5047
5048      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
5049
5050      ! reallocate obsdat_inout to the new size and copy over redistributed data
5051      call obs_deallocate(obsdat_inout)
5052      call obs_allocate(obsdat_inout,obsdat_tmp%numHeader,obsdat_tmp%numBody)
5053      call obs_copy(obsdat_tmp,obsdat_inout)
5054      call obs_finalize(obsdat_tmp)
5055
5056      write(*,*) '============= Leave obs_MpiRedistribute =============='
5057      write(*,*) 'Memory Used: ',get_max_rss()/1024,'Mb'
5058
5059      return
5060   end subroutine obs_MpiRedistribute
5061
5062
5063   subroutine obs_set_c(obsdat, name, row_index, value)
5064      !
5065      !:Purpose: set a character(len=9) in the observation object
5066      !      To control access to the observation object.
5067      !
5068      implicit none
5069      type(struct_obs), intent(inout)  :: obsdat
5070      character(len=*), intent(in)     :: name
5071      integer         , intent(in)     :: row_index
5072      character(len=*), intent(in)     :: value
5073
5074      select case (trim(name))
5075      case ('STID'); obsdat%cstnid (row_index) = value
5076         if(row_index == (obsdat%numHeader+1)) obsdat%numHeader = obsdat%numHeader+1
5077
5078      case default
5079         call obs_abort('ERROR writing:  ' // trim(name) // &
5080                        ' is not a character(len=9) observation.')
5081         return
5082      end select
5083   end subroutine obs_set_c
5084

5086   subroutine obs_set_current_body_list_from_family(obsdat, family, &
5087      list_is_empty, current_list)
5088      !
5089      !:Purpose:
5090      !      Create a row_index list from the indicated family and place it in
5091      !      the body depot.
5092      !
5093      implicit none
5094      type(struct_obs), intent(inout), target :: obsdat
5095      character(len=*), intent(in) :: family
5096      logical, intent(out), optional :: list_is_empty
5097      type(struct_index_list), pointer, intent(out), optional :: current_list
5098
5099      type(struct_index_list_depot), pointer :: depot
5100      type(struct_index_list), pointer :: index_list
5101      integer :: index_header, list, list_index, row_index
5102      integer :: first, last
5103
5104      nullify(index_list)
5105      depot => obsdat%body_index_list_depot
5106
5107      ! Search for an existing list
5108      if(present(current_list)) then
5109         if(associated(current_list)) then
5110            if (current_list%family == family) then
5111               index_list => current_list
5112            end if ! family matches
5113         end if ! associated
5114
5115      else ! not present(current_list)
5116         do list = 1, NUMBER_OF_LISTS
5117            if (depot%index_lists(list)%family == family) then
5118               index_list => depot%index_lists(list)
5119               exit                     ! Don't look any further
5120            end if
5121         end do
5122      end if
5123
5124      ! If the list does not already exist
5125      if (.not. associated(index_list)) then
5126
5127         ! Acquire memory for the list
5128         if(present(current_list)) then
5129            ! This is an OMP thread. Re-use the same physical memory for the list
5130            index_list => ild_get_empty_index_list(depot, current_list)
5131         else
5132            index_list => ild_get_empty_index_list(depot)
5133         end if
5134
5135         ! Initialize the new list
5136         index_list%family = family
5137         index_list%header = -99        ! not used
5138
5139         !
5140         ! Populate the list
5141         !
5142
5143         ! Loop over all header indices of the family
5144         list_index = 0
5145         call obs_set_current_header_list(obsdat, family)
5146         HEADER: do
5147            index_header = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsdat)
5148            if (index_header < 0) exit HEADER
5149            first= obs_headElem_i(obsdat,OBS_RLN,index_header)
5150            last = obs_headElem_i(obsdat,OBS_NLV,index_header) + first - 1
5151            do row_index=first,last     ! For each item indicated in the header
5152               ! Add the row_index to the list
5153               list_index = list_index + 1
5154               index_list%indices(list_index) = row_index
5155            end do
5156         end do HEADER
5157         index_list%indices(list_index+1)= -1 ! Flag the end of the list ...
5158         index_list%indices(list_index+2)= -1 ! ... clearly
5159      end if ! list does not already exist
5160
5161      index_list%current_element = 0    ! Set pointer to the start of the list
5162      depot%current_list => index_list  ! Note the current list
5163
5164      if(present(list_is_empty)) then
5165         ! Return whether the list is empty
5166         list_is_empty = (ild_get_next_index(depot, no_advance=.true.) < 0)
5167      end if
5168
5169      if(present(current_list)) then
5170         ! Return a pointer to the current list
5171         current_list => index_list
5172      end if
5173   end subroutine obs_set_current_body_list_from_family
5174
5175

5347   subroutine obs_set_current_header_list_from_family(obsdat, family)
5348      !
5349      !:Purpose:
5350      !      Find or create a row_index list for the indicated family and place
5351      !      it in the header depot.
5352      !
5353      implicit none
5354      type(struct_obs), intent(inout), target :: obsdat
5355      character(len=*), intent(in) :: family
5356
5357      type(struct_index_list_depot), pointer :: depot
5358      type(struct_index_list), pointer :: index_list
5359      integer :: list, list_index, row_index
5360
5361      nullify(index_list)
5362      depot => obsdat%header_index_list_depot
5363
5364      ! Search for an existing list
5365      do list = 1, NUMBER_OF_LISTS
5366         if (depot%index_lists(list)%family == family) then
5367            index_list => depot%index_lists(list)
5368            index_list%current_element=0! Start at the beginning of the list
5369            exit                        ! Don't look any further
5370         end if
5371      end do
5372
5373      ! If the list does not already exist
5374      if (.not. associated(index_list)) then
5375         ! Create a new list
5376         index_list => ild_get_empty_index_list(depot)
5377         index_list%family = family
5378         index_list%header = -1
5379
5380         ! Populate the list
5381         list_index = 0
5382         do row_index = 1, obsdat%numHeader
5383            ! If the station is of the right family
5384            if(obsdat%cfamily(row_index) == family) then
5385               ! Add the row_index to the list
5386               list_index = list_index + 1
5387               index_list%indices(list_index) = row_index
5388            end if
5389         end do
5390         index_list%indices(list_index+1)= -1 ! Flag the end of the list ...
5391         index_list%indices(list_index+2)= -1 ! ... clearly
5392      end if ! list does not already exist
5393
5394      index_list%current_element = 0    ! Set pointer to the start of the list
5395      depot%current_list => index_list  ! Note the current list
5396   end subroutine obs_set_current_header_list_from_family
5397

5466   subroutine obs_setHeadPrimaryKey(obsdat,headerIndex,primaryKey)
5467      !
5468      !:Purpose:
5469      !      Set to the indicated value the header primary key for the indicated header.
5470      !
5471      implicit none
5472      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
5473      integer(8),       intent(in)    :: primaryKey
5474      integer,optional, intent(in)    :: headerIndex
5475
5476      obsdat%headerPrimaryKey(headerIndex) = primaryKey
5477      if(headerIndex == (obsdat%numHeader+1)) then
5478         obsdat%numHeader=obsdat%numHeader+1
5479      endif
5480
5481   end subroutine obs_setHeadPrimaryKey
5482
5483
5484   subroutine obs_setFamily(obsdat,Family_in,headerIndex_in,bodyIndex)
5485      !
5486      !:Purpose:
5487      !      Set to the indicated value the family for the indicated header, or
5488      !      else for the indicated body.
5489      !
5490      implicit none
5491      type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsdat
5492      character(len=*), intent(in)    :: Family_in
5493      integer,optional, intent(in)    :: headerIndex_in,bodyIndex
5494
5495      integer          :: headerIndex
5496
5497      if(present(headerIndex_in)) then
5498         headerIndex=headerIndex_in
5499      elseif(present(bodyIndex)) then
5500         headerIndex=obs_bodyElem_i(obsdat,OBS_HIND,bodyIndex)
5501      else
5502         call obs_abort('OBS_SETFAMILY: Header or Body index must be specified!')
5503         return
5504      endif
5505
5506      obsdat%cfamily(headerIndex)=Family_in
5507      if(headerIndex == (obsdat%numHeader+1)) then
5508         obsdat%numHeader=obsdat%numHeader+1
5509      endif
5510
5511   end subroutine obs_setFamily
5512
5513
5514   subroutine obs_sethind(obsSpaceData)
5515     !
5516     !:Purpose: Set the header index in the body table
5517     !
5518     implicit none
5519     type(struct_obs) :: obsSpaceData
5520     integer :: ij,idata,idatend,bodyIndex,headerIndex
5521     !
5522     ! Set the header index in the body of obsSpaceData
5523     !
5524     ij=0
5525     do headerIndex = 1, obs_numheader(obsSpaceData)
5526        idata   = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData,OBS_RLN,headerIndex)
5527        idatend = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData,OBS_NLV,headerIndex) + idata - 1
5528        do bodyIndex= idata, idatend
5529           ij   = ij+1
5530           call obs_bodySet_i(obsSpaceData,OBS_HIND,IJ, headerIndex)
5531        end do
5532     end do
5533   end subroutine obs_sethind
5534
5535
5536   subroutine obs_write(obsdat,hx, &
5537      nens,nobshdrout,nobsbdyout,nobshxout,nobsdimout)
5538      ! 
5539      !:Purpose: 
5540      !      Write the obsdat info to unformatted files.
5541      !
5542      !:Note: the body information is written in the order that it will
5543      !      be used by sekfeta.f
5544      !
5545      implicit none
5546      type(struct_obs), intent(in) :: obsdat
5547      real(8),      intent(in), dimension(:,:) :: hx
5548      integer,      intent(in) :: nens,nobshdrout,nobsbdyout, &
5549         nobshxout,nobsdimout
5550
5551      integer :: irealBodies,jo,nrealBodies
5552
5553      irealBodies=1
5554      do jo=1,obsdat%numHeader
5555         call obs_write_hdr(obsdat,jo,nobshdrout,irealBodies,nrealBodies)
5556         call obs_write_bdy(obsdat,jo,nobsbdyout)
5557         if (nens > 0) then
5558            call obs_write_hx(obsdat,hx,jo,nobshxout)
5559         endif
5560         irealBodies=irealBodies+nrealBodies
5561      enddo
5562      write(nobsdimout,*) obsdat%numHeader
5563      write(nobsdimout,*) irealBodies-1
5564      write(nobsdimout,*) nens
5565
5566      return
5567
5568   end subroutine obs_write
5569
5570
5571   subroutine obs_write_bdy(obsdat,kobs,kulout)
5572      !
5573      !:Purpose: write the data records associated with a
5574      !                 station in unformatted form.
5575      !
5576      !:Arguments:
5577      !           :obsdat: obsSpaceData object
5578      !           :kobs: no. of observation
5579      !           :kulout: unit used for writing 
5580      !
5581      implicit none 
5582
5583      type(struct_obs), intent(in) :: obsdat
5584      integer, intent(in) ::  kobs,kulout
5585
5586      integer :: ipnt,idata,j,jdata,k
5587
5588
5589      ipnt  = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, kobs) 
5590      idata = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, kobs)
5591
5592      ! write the data records
5593      do jdata=ipnt,ipnt+idata-1
5594         write(kulout) &
5595           (obsdat%intBodies%columns(odc_ENKF_bdy_int_column_list(k) &
5596                                    )%value_i(jdata), &
5597                 k=1,size(odc_ENKF_bdy_int_column_list(:))),&
5598           (obsdat%realBodies%columns(odc_ENKF_bdy_real_column_list(j) &
5599                                     )%value_r(jdata), &
5600                 j=1,size(odc_ENKF_bdy_real_column_list(:)))
5601      enddo
5602
5603      return
5604
5605   end subroutine obs_write_bdy
5606
5607
5608   subroutine obs_write_hdr( obsdat, kobs, kulout, irealBodies, nrealBodies )
5609      !
5610      !:Purpose: writing of the header of a station record
5611      !
5612      !:Arguments:
5613      !           :obsdat: obsSpaceData object
5614      !           :kobs: no. of observation
5615      !           :kulout: unit used for output 
5616      !           :irealBodies: location in the sorted realBodies
5617      !           :nrealBodies: number of observations for this header
5618      !
5619      implicit none
5620
5621      type(struct_obs), intent(in)  :: obsdat
5622      integer         , intent(in)  :: kobs
5623      integer         , intent(in)  :: kulout
5624      integer         , intent(in)  :: irealBodies
5625      integer         , intent(out) :: nrealBodies
5626
5627      integer :: i,j,nprocs_mpi,ierr
5628
5629
5630      ! (note that as a part of the writing, the body is being sorted
5631      !  so that the order of the observations in the body array 
5632      !  corresponds with the order of the headers in the header array).
5633      call rpn_comm_size("GRID",nprocs_mpi,ierr)
5634
5635      if(obsdat%mpi_local .and. nprocs_mpi>1) then
5636         call obs_abort('obs_write_hdr() is not equipped to handle the ' // &
5637                        'case, mpi_local=.true.')
5638         return
5639      end if
5640
5641      nrealBodies=obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, kobs)
5642      ! write the header's content 
5643      write(kulout) irealBodies, &
5644            (obs_headElem_i &
5645                  (obsdat, &
5646                   odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat%intHeaders%odc_flavour,&
5647                                                  i), &
5648                   kobs &
5649                  ), &
5650             i=2,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%intHeaders) &
5651            ), &
5652
5653            (obs_headElem_r &
5654                 (obsdat, &
5655                  odc_columnIndexFromActiveIndex(obsdat%realHeaders%odc_flavour,&
5656                                                 j), &
5657                  kobs &
5658                 ), &
5659             j=1,odc_numActiveColumn(obsdat%realHeaders) &
5660            ), &
5661
5662            obsdat%cstnid(kobs), &
5663            obsdat%cfamily(kobs)
5664
5665      return
5666
5667   end subroutine obs_write_hdr
5668
5669
5670   subroutine obs_write_hx(obsdat,hx,kobs,kulout)
5671      !
5672      !:Purpose: write the interpolated values associated with a
5673      !                 station in unformatted form.
5674      !
5675      !:Arguments:
5676      !           :obsdat: obsSpaceData object
5677      !           :hx: interpolated values    
5678      !           :kobs: no. of station 
5679      !           :kulout: unit used for writing 
5680      !
5681      implicit none 
5682
5683      type(struct_obs), intent(in) :: obsdat
5684      real(8), intent(in), dimension(:,:) :: hx
5685      integer, intent(in) :: kobs
5686      integer, intent(in) :: kulout
5687
5688      integer :: ipnt,idata,iens,jdata,nens
5689
5690      nens = size(hx,1)
5691
5692      ipnt  = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_RLN, kobs) 
5693      idata = obs_headElem_i(obsdat, OBS_NLV, kobs)
5694
5695      ! write the data records
5696      do jdata=ipnt,ipnt+idata-1
5697         write(kulout) (hx(iens,jdata),iens=1,nens)
5698      enddo
5699
5700      return
5701
5702   end subroutine obs_write_hx

5705   function obs_famExist( obsdat, family, localMPI_opt )
5706     !
5707     !:Purpose: Check if any observations of a particular family are present
5708     !          in obsdat. Returned result will be the MPI local value if
5709     !          the optional argument local_mpi is set to .true., will be
5710     !          the MPI global value otherwise.
5711     !
5712     !:Arguments:
5713     !           :obsdat: ObsSpaceData structure
5714     !           :family: Obs family
5715     !           :localMPI_opt: return MPI local result; optional, default is .false.
5716     !
5717     implicit none 
5718
5719     logical                                :: obs_famExist  ! Logical indicating if 'family' is part of the list
5720     type(struct_obs), intent(in)           :: obsdat
5721     character(len=2), intent(in)           :: family
5722     logical         , intent(in), optional :: localMPI_opt
5723     
5724     integer :: index_header,ierr
5725     logical :: famExist,local
5726
5727     if (present(localMPI_opt)) then
5728        local = localMPI_opt
5729     else
5730        local = .false.
5731     end if
5732     
5733     famExist = .false.
5734
5735     ! check if family exists in local MPI process
5736     do index_header = 1,obs_numheader(obsdat)
5737        if (obs_getFamily(obsdat,index_header) == family) then
5738           famExist = .true.
5739           exit
5740        end if
5741     end do
5742
5743     if (local) then
5744        ! return MPI local value
5745        obs_famExist = famExist
5746     else
5747        ! return MPI global value
5748        call rpn_comm_allreduce(famExist,obs_famExist,1,"MPI_LOGICAL","MPI_LOR","GRID",ierr)
5749     end if
5750
5751   end function obs_famExist
5752
5753end module ObsSpaceData_mod
